column2: Tokyo 2020: Ornella Havyarimana yipfuza guha u Burundi umudari olempike wa gatatu
column3: Ornella Havyarimana ariteguye kuba umurundi wa mbere akina umukino wa Boxe agiye guserukira igihugu ciwe mu mahiganwa olempike azobera i Tokyo mu kwezi kuza. Kw'igenekerezo 25/07 Havyarimana azotangura guhiganwa n'abigeme bashika 25 bo mu bihugu 25, barimwo na Christine Ongare umunyakenya baheruka kurushanywa  mu kwezi kwa gatatu i Kinshasa. Havyarimana, yaronse ikibanza mu mahiganwa olempike ku butumire mu gihe atari yashoboye kuronka ico kibanza mu mahiganwa yo kukironka muri Africa. Umumenyereza wiwe avuga ko ico kibanza bakimenyeshejwe muri iyi ndwi "bisa n'ibitevye gatoya" ariko Ornella n'ubundi yari asanzwe abandanya imyimenyerezo. Inkuru y'uko Ornella azoja i Tokyo yaramuryoheye cane, kuko yasanze ari mu myiteguro yo kurondera ikibanza mu mahiganwa nk'aya azobera i Paris mu 2024,  ati: "Nari nagumye ku kivi, n'ubu nguma mbandanya". Ornella yabariye BBC ko guserukira Uburundi ubwa mbere muri Boxe mu mahiganwa olempike ari intango izobera abandi barundikazi akarorero keza. Ati: "Ni irya mbere ngiye muri Jeux Olympiques, kuva boxe itangura mu Burundi ntiyari bwinjire muri ayo mahiganwa ni jewe ngiye gutangura, ni umunezero ntangere." Eric Ndayishimiye arongoye ishirahamwe ry'urukino rwa Boxe mu Burundi avuga ko ari "iteka n'akanyamuneza" ko bashoboye kuronka umuntu azoserukira urwo rukino muri izo nkino. Azohiganwa n'abakomeye Kuva igenerekezo rya 23 z'ukwezi gutaha abanonotsi beza kw'isi barenga 11,000 bo mu bihugu 205 baritezwe guhiganwa i Tokyo mu nkino zishika 50 zitandukanye. Buri munonotsi ashika hariya ni uko aba afise ivyo yerekanye ko ashoboye nk'uko Eric Ndayishimiye abivuga, ariko kandi ngo arizeye ko Ornella azoseruka neza. Joseph Nkamicaniye umumenyereza wiwe avuga ko Ornella yabandanije yitegura n'aho atari yaronse 'qualifications' y'aya mahiganwa ya Tokyo. Ati: "Ntiyari yigeze ahagarika imyimenyerezo kuko no mu mezi abiri aheze yaheruka mw'ihiganwa rya Africa ryabereye i Kinshasa urumva ntiyigeze ahagarika imyimenyerezo. "Mu ndwi zisigaye turiko tumutegura kugira 'endurance, souffle na technique', twongera kandi tumuha na morale kuko abo bazohura i Tokyo bahora bahurira mu mahiganwa y'isi'. Ndayishimiye nawe avuga ko ata nkeka afise ko Ornella ashobora "kuvyitwaramwo neza i Tokyo kuko ni ibintu amenyereye". Ati: "Yaragiye mu mahiganwa y'isi muri Korea, n'i Delhi mu Buhinde, yaragiye i Thailand, yaragiye mu Burusiya, yarahiganywe no mu mahiganwa ya Africa muri Gabon na Kinshasa". Azovana umudari  w'umwakaka i Tokyo? Mu 1996, ubwa mbere Uburundi buseruka mu mahiganwa olempike i Atlanta muri Amerika, Vénuste Niyongabo yateye iteka igihugu ciwe atahukana umudari w'inzahabu mu gusiganwa 5,000m. Imyaka 20 inyuma yaho Francine Niyonsaba yabaye uwa kabiri mu gusiganwa 800m mu bigeme mu mahiganwa olempike ya Rio de Janeiro 2016, atahukana umudari w'ifeza. Ornella yiyumvira ko bishoboka ko uretse kuba uwa mbere aserutse muri boxe yonaba uwa gatatu ateye iteka Uburundi agatakana umudari wa wa olempike. Ati: "Hariya nzokora vyose bishoboka kugira ntahane umudari  kubera bariya tuzohura bose ndabazi, dusanzwe duhurira mu mahiganwa y'isi." Nkamicaniye amumenyereza avuga ko hariya haseruka abantu bakomeye ariko na Ornella "azoseruka yazikenyeye". Ati: "Nubwo usanga hatabuze intambamyi zimwe zimwe, turiko turamutegura mu buryo bwose. Turavuga ngo ntiworirimba intsinzi utarashika ku kivi, ariko umudari nawo ashobora kuwutahukana." Ndayishimiye wewe ati: "Turanezerewe cane haba twebwe muri federation canke Abarundi bose ko Ornella agiye kuduserukira, twogira Imana akazana umudari  vyotuma igihugu kigira izina ryiza gusumba."

column2: Jus za pomme zikorwa na Ceres zisabwa kuvanwa mw'icuruzwa
column3: Umutobe (jus/juice)  wa pomme (apple) ukorwa na kompanyi yo muri Africa y'Epfo Ceres vyasabwe ko uvanwa mw'icuruzwa  mu bihugu indwi vyo muri Afrika vyawuranguye kubera ufise urugero runini rwa patulin  ishobora gutera kudahwa no gusesemwa. Patulin n'ubumara buterwa n'ifira ry'ubwoko butandukanye  usanga mu ma pommes canke mu bikozwe mu ma pommes. Ibipimo vyo muri laboratoire  vyerekanye ko imitobe ya Ceres irimwo patulin ku rugero ruri hejuru cane y'urwemewe rwa microgrammes 50 kuri ritiro imwe. Iyo mitobe igurishwa muri Kenya, RDC (Congo Kinshasa), Zambia, Zimbabwe, Uganda, Seychelles n'izinga rya Maurice. Ariko no mu bihugu bibanyi vy'ivyo vyaranguye  iyo mitobe ishobora kuba ishikayo. Urwego rw'isoko rusangi rw'ibihugu vyo muri Afrika y'Ubuseruko n'iy'ubumanuko (Comesa)  rwahimirije abaguzi gusubiza imitekero yose ifise amatariki yo hagati ya 14 na 30 ukwezi kwa gatandatu 2021.

column2: Covid: France yategetse ko urucanco rwa AstraZeneca ruhabwa abari musi y'imyaka 65 gusa
column3: Abajejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bufaransa bavuga ko urucanco rwa Covid-19 rwahinguwe na AstraZeneca rwohabwa abari munsi y'imyaka 65. Iki gihugu co mu muryango w'ibihugu vya Buraya kivuga ko ata vyemezo bikwiye ko uru rucanco rushobora gukora ku bantu bageze mu zabukuru. Ikigo kijejwe kugenzura imiti mu muryango w'Ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Buraya caremeje urucanco rwa AstraZeneca ku bantu bose bakuze, ariko buri gihugu gifata ingingo y'ingene kizorukoresha. Ubudagi na Autriche/Austria vyaramaze gutegeka ko ruhabwa abari munsi y'imyaka 65. Mu ndwi iheze, umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'igihubu vya Buraya waragiye mu mpari na AstraZeneca, inyuma y'aho iyi kompanyi itangarije ko idashoboye gukora incanco gushika ku rugero rwari rwitezwe mu kiringo categekanijwe. Umukuru w'uyu muryango, Ursula von der Leyen ubwiwe aranegurwa cane akagirizwa ko yafashe minenerwe iri sekeza ryo gucandaga, ariko ejo ku wa kabiri yarireguye. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Bufaransa Le Monde ati: "Ndizeye neza ko inzira yafashwe n'Uburaya ku bijanye no gucandaga ari yo nziza". Eka n'umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubudagi Angela Merkel na we nyene yarashigikiye inzira yafashwe n'umuryango wa Buraya, hari mu kiganiro ku mboneshakure. Ikigo kijejwe kugenzura ibijanye n'amagara y'abantu kivuga ko ata vyemezo bikwiye bafise vyerekana ko urucanco rwakozwe n'ikompanyi AstraZeneca rukora ku bantu barenza imyaka 65. Iki kigo kivuga kiti: "Ibi vyemezo bizoboneka mu ndwi ziri imbere. Mu kurindira, dusavye ko rwohabwa abantu bari munsi y'imyaka 65". Categetse ko ruhabwa abakozi bo mu gisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu hamwe n'abatishoboye bari hagati y'imyaka 50 na 65. Gushika ubu, abantu barenga umuriyoni n'igice mu Bufaransa ni bo bamaze kuronswa urucanco rwa Covid. Mu Bwongereza hoho, abamaze kuronswa urucanco barenga imiriyoni cumi, mu gihe ibi bihugu bifise ibitigiri vy'abantu vyababana. Mu ndwi iheze, umurwi w'Ubudagi ujejwe gucandaga wavuze ko udashobora kwemera ko uru rucanco ruhabwa abantu barenga imyaka 65. Ejo ku wa kabiri, abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Suwede na Polonye, nabo nyene barafashe iyo ngingo, mu gihe umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'Ububirigi nawe avuga ko muri kino gihe, bazoruha abatarenza imyaka 55 gusa. Eka n'Ubutariyano nabwo nyene ku wa gatandatu uheze bwaremeje ko uru rucanco rwokoreshwa, ariko rugahabwa abatarenza 55 bo nyene. Hagati aho, mu cigwa batarashira ahabona, abahinga bo kuri kaminuza ya Oxford, bavuga ko uru rucanco rushobora kugabanya "bimwe biboneka" ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera. Ibihugu vya Buraya birafise uburenganzira bwo kwifatira ingingo ku gatwe kavyo ku bantu bohabwa incanco kanaka mu gihe zimaze kwemezwa ku rwego rw'umugabane. Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'imboneshakure ejo ku wa kabiri, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubudagi yavuze ko "urucanco urwo ari rwo rwose ruhawe ikaze mu muryango wa Buraya". Avuga kandi ko hari amakuru ahumuriza cane ku rucanco rw'Uburusiya Sputnik V. Mu mugambi wabwo wo gucandaga umaze indwi zitari nke, Ubwongereza bumaze igihe bukoresha uru rucanco rwakozwe na AstraZeneca, ikompanyi ihingura imiti yegukira Ubwongereza na Suwede. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza bavuga ko uru rucanco ata ngorane rutera kandi ko "rukingira ku rugero runini" abantu ku myaka itandukanye. Icigwa cerekana ko uru rucanco rukora neza cane. Mu gihe rwariko rurageragezwa, nta n'umwe mu baruhawe yigeze ajanwa mu bitaro canke ngo arembe kubera Covid. Uru rucanco rutangwa mu nshinge zibiri ziterwa ku ncuro zibiri nyene ku kuboko, urwa kabiri rugaterwa inyuma y'indwi hagati ya 4 na 12 kuva umuntu atewe urwa mbere. Igihe ishirahamwe rijejwe imiti mu muryango w'Ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Buraya ryemeza uru rucanco mu ndwi iheze, ryavuze ko abenshi mu barugeragerejweko bari munsi y'imyaka 55. Ryavuze ko mu gihe ata vyemezo bihagije vyerekana ko uru rucanco rushobora gukora ku bantu bakuze, "rurakora neza ku bantu bari muri uyu murwi kubera abasoda b'umubiri bakora neza ". AstraZeneca ivuga ko icigwa giherutse gukorwa na Amerika kizotanga ibindi vyemezo kuri uru rucanco ku bantu bageze mu zabukuru.

column2: UN / ONU : Inama nkuru ijejwe umutekano isaba ihagarikwa ry’ivyegeranyo vyihariye ku Burundi
column3: Inama nkuru ijejwe umutekano mw'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU isaba umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU gukura Uburundi ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bitegerezwa kwigwako mu buryo bwihariye. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, iyi Nama  irashima intambwe imaze gushikwako na reta y'Uburundi mu bijanye n'umutekano, ukurwanya ukudahana no mu bisata bitandukanye, ariko ikavuga ko hakiri vyinshi bigikenewe mu bijanye no kunywanisha abarundi, ubutungane, intwaro rusangi hamwe no kwubahiriza uburenganzira bwa kiremwa muntu. Irerekana kandi impungenge ifise ku bijanye n'ihohoterwa ry'uburenganzira bwa muntu, igasaba reta y'Uburundi gukorana n'ishirahamwe ONU kugira ngo itorere umuti ibi bibazo. Uburundi bwarinjiye mu ndyane za politike mu 2015 ziturutse ku ngingo ya Nyakwigendera Perezida Petero Nkurunziza yo gusubira kwitoreza ikindi kiringo, abamurwanya bavuga ko cari giteye kubiri n'ibwirizwa shingiro, ariko ubutungane bw'akarere bukaba bwavuze ko itari iteye kubiri n'itegeko na rimwe. Mw'iryo tangazo, umukuru w'inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano, arashima intambwe reta irongowe na Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye imaze gushikako mu bisata bitandukanye, ndetse no mu bijanye n'ibikorwa nyamukuru yashize imbere igihe ahikiriza reta yiwe. Hagati aho, avuga ko hari ibikorwa vy'ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu bibandanya guhagarika umutima, agasaba reta kubihagarika kandi igashengeza ababikora. Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano iragaruka ku masezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha yateweko igikumu n'abanyeporitike ku wa 28 z'ukwa munani 2000, igasaba ko yubahiriwa. Mw'iryo tangazo ryayo ivuga iti: "Inama nkuru ijejwe umutekano kw'isi isaba ishirahamwe ONU, Umuryango w'ubumwe bwa Afrika, Umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika y'Ubuseruko, Inama mpuzamakungu ku karere k'ibiyaga binini (CIRGL/ICGLR) hamwe n'abo bose bafise uruhara mu masezerano ya Arusha gushira hamwe inguvu zabo bagafasha impande zose gushira mu ngiro amasezerano ya Arusha, yafashije gutsimbataza amahoro mu Burundi". Abanyepolitike batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi babona ko reta ya CNDD-FDD yahonyanze aya masezerano. Iyi nama irasaba umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU kwihweza gushasha ingingo yo kwama ishikiriza raporo y'ingene ibintu vyifashe mu Burundi uko amezi atatu aheze, ingingo yari yafashwe mu 2017 inyuma y'aho igihugu cinjiriye mu ndyane za politike mu 2015. Iti: "Inama isaba umunyamabanga mukuru guhagarika ivyegeranyo vya buri gihe ku kibazo c'Uburundi kandi ikipfuza ko Uburundi bwoza buraza mu vyegeranyo bisanzwe ku karere k'ibiyaga binini no kuri Afrika yo hagati". Muri Reta y'Uburundi, ni umunezero udasanzwe kuri iri jambo ryashikirijwe n'umukuru w'Inama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano, ku bijanye no gusaba ko Uburundi bwokurwa kuri urwo rutonde. Umukuru w'igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye yanditse ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter ati: "Ndashimiye Inama Nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano kubona yakirije yompi akamo nayiteye mu Nama ya bose. Kubwiwe, gukura Uburundi ku rutonde rwa ONU bifasha iki gihugu, incuti n'abagenzi kwitaho iterambere n'imibereho myiza y'abenegihugu. Eka n'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire y'Uburundi n'ayandi makungu arashima aka kamo katewe n'iyi Nama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano. Albert Shingiro, ari nawe yahoze aserukira Uburundi muri ONU igihe iyi ngingo ifatwa, ashimira ibihugu avuga ko vyaterereye.

column2: Mali: Macron yatangaje ivanwa ry'ingabo inyuma y'imyaka icenda muri ico gihugu
column3: Ubufaransa n'ibihugu bifatanije mu ngabo za Buraya bigiye kuvana ingabo zavyo muri Mali inyuma y'imyaka hafi cumi, nk'uko vyatangajwe na prezida Emmanuel Macron. Izo ngabo zari zimaze iyo myaka ziri mu  rugamba rwo kurwanya intagondwa z'aba Islam muri ico gihugu kuva mu 2013. Prezida Macron yavuze ko ingingo yo kuva muri ico gihugu  yatewe n'itituka ry'imigenderanire, mu gihe akagawi k'abasirikare bafashe ubutegetsi muri Mali kabandanya kugaragaza ko katerekwa Ubufaransa. Izo ngabo zica zirungikwa mu bindi bihugu vy'ako karere ka Sahel. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru i Paris ku wa kane, prezida Macron yavuze ati: "Ntidushobora kubandanya turi mu bikorwa vya gisirikare dukorana n'abantu bihariye ubutegetsi, bafise imikenyuro n'imigambi yinyegeje tutemera". Yahakanye ibivugwa ko kuva muri Mali ari ukwemera ko bananiwe aca ashimika avuga ko Ubufaransa buzoguma mu gikorwa co kurwanya ibikorwa vy'intagondwa z'aba Islam muri ako karere. Yamenyesheje ko igihugu ca Niger cemeye kwakira zimwe muri izo ngabo zizoba zikuwe muri Mali. Yavuze ati: "Ubufaransa bwagize uruhara rwo guhuriza hamwe inguvu  muri ico gikorwa mpuzamakungu co gufasha Sahel. "Tuzobandanya urwo ruhara rwo guhuriza hamwe". Igikorwa co kuvanayo izo ngabo, gitegekanijwe kumara ikiringo kiri hagati y'amezi ane n'amezi atandatu, catangajwe inyuma y'inama y'abategetsi ba Buraya na Afrika ku biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubufaransa, Champs Élysée, ku wa gatatu mw'ijoro. Mw'itangazo ryasohotse kuri uyu wa kane mu gitondo, ibihugu bifise uruhara mu mugwi wa Tabuka urongowe n'Ubufaransa rivuga ko bumvikanye ko gushika mu kwezi kwa gatandatu hazoba hashizweho imigambi yo kuguma bafasha  muri ako karere, na cane cane muri Niger no mu bihugu vy'ikigobe ca Guinee. Hafi ingabo 5.000 z'abafaransa ziri mu butumwa bwo kurwanya intangondwa z'aba Islam muri Sahel mu gikorwa kizwi nka Barkhane, izishika 2.400 zikaba ziri mu makambi atatu mu buraruko bwa Mali. Iyo karata iri aho munsi irerekana akarere ka Sahel n'ibihugu karimwo Ariko imigenderanire y'Ubufaransa na Mali, kimwe mu bihugu bikenye cane kw'isi, yaratitutse cane muri iyi minsi kuva igisirikare gifashe igihugu mw'itembagazwa ry'unbutegetsi ryabaye mu kwezi kw'umunani mu 2020. Ibintu vyunyutse kuruta mu kwezi guheze igihe abo basirikare bisubirako ku mwumvikano bari bemeye wo gutunganya amatora mu kwezi kwa kabiri hanyuma bakavuga ko bazoguma ku butegetsi gushika mu 2025, mu nyuma bagahava bakirukana uwuserukira Ubufaransa. Mu kwezi kwa 12, ibihugu birenga 10 vyo mu Burengerazuba vyiyamirije kandi  umuzo w'abacangero b'umugwi ushingiye mu Burusiya wa Wagner muri Mali. Uwo mugwi umaze kugira uruhara mu ntambara zitari nke zikomeye mu bihugu nka Syria, Mozambique, Sudan na Centrafrique. Amatohoza ya BBC yerekanye ko uwo mugwi ufise aho uhuriye n'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara muri Libya. Macron yagabishije avuga ko uwo mugwi waje "gukingira inyungu zawo n'iz'abari ku butegetsi ubwabo". Inkuru y'uko Ubufaransa bukuye akarenge ntiyakiriwe kumwe muri Mali. Umugabo umwe yabwiye BBC ko ivyo "bizozana amahoro mu buraruko bw'igihugu cacu kuko Uburusiya na Wagner ata nkeka ko bazoshigikira ingabo zacu", mu gihe uwundi yavuze ko  ingabo z'Ubufaransa muri Mali zananiwe. Ariko hari abandi bashikirije amakenga ko ibintu biriko birunyuka. Umwe mu bafise impungenge yabwiye BBC ati: "Ejo harabaye igitero  mu gice c'uburaruko bwa Mali... Abasirikare bacu bari mu gice co hagati. Bavuga ko ingabo ziriko zirigarurira uturere. Ariko aho ni mu majahagati y'igihugu gusa. Mu zindi ntara ho gute?" Ivanwa ry'ingabo z'Ubufaransa muri Mali rizogira ingaruka z'umutekano ku bindi bihugu vyo mu karere ka Sahel  navyo nyene bisanzwe bihanzwe n'intagomdwa za Islam. Umukuru wa Côte d'Ivoire Alassane Ouattara yagabishije ko iyo ngingo izosiga igihengeri kizosaba utundi twigoro ama reta y'ibihugu vyo mu karere. Ouattara ati: "Bizodusaba kwongereza ingabo kandi turushirizeho gukingira imbibe zacu." Ariko umukuru wa Senegal Macky Sall avuga ko atahura igituma Ubufaransa bwafashe ingingo yo kuva muri Mali, kandi yizeza ko urugamba rwo kurwanya intagondwa za Islam muri Sahel  ruzokomeza. Hagati aho umukuru wa Ghana  Nana Akufo-Addo yavuze ko ari nkenerwa cane ko ingabo za ONU ziguma zikora muri Mali n'ubwo Ubufaransa buvuyeyo. Umuvugizi wa ONU yavuze ati uko bigenda kwose hazoba "ingaruka ku bikorwa." Hari n'amakenga kuri kazoza k'intumwa za Buraya zo kwigisha abasirikare muri Mali , inyuma y'aho umushikiranganji w'Ubudagi ajejwe  kwivuna abansi Christine Lambrecht  avugiye ko  ata cizere afise ko Ubudagi buzobandanya ubwo butumwa. Yavuze ati: "Twamenye  ingingo y'Ubufaransa yo kuva  kuva muri Mali no kurangiza ubutumwa bwabwo muri ico gihugu, ingingo ata nkeka izogira ingaruka kubo bari bafatanije ubutumwa."

column2: Umushikiranganji w’ikigega wa Afrika y’Epfo asaba ko urucuruza rw’urumogi rwemerwa n’amategeko
column3: Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca leta ya Afrika y'Epfo,  Tito Mboweni, asaba leta y'ico gihugu ko urucuruza rw'urumogi rwemerwa n'amategeko kugira ngo amakori yiyongere. Yatangaje ivyo aciye ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter, aho yamenyesheje ko ico kibazo azogishikiriza mu nama y'abashikiranganji. Kuri urwo rubuga rwiwe, yashizeko n'isanamu yerekana ingene ico giterwa gitera gikura. Amategeko ya Afrika y'Epfo yari asanzwe avuga ko ukugurisha urumogi, uko rwoba rungana kwose biteye kubiri n'amategeko. Hagati aho, mu mwaka wa 2017, ico gihugu caremereye abantu gukoresha urumogi mu mihana iwabo, ariko nticarekuye kururima canke kurugurisha. Mu bihugu vyinshi vya Afrika, harimwo n'u Burundi n'u Rwanda, kurima, gukoresha canke kudandaza urumogi ntivyemewe n'amategeko kubera rufatwa nk'ikiyayuramutwe. Hagati aho, hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe birukoresha ku rugero runini. Muri ivyo harimwo igihugu ca Lesotho gisanzwe gikikujwe na Afrika y'Epfo, aho urumogi rurimwa ku rugero runini cane, rukaba rwemewe mu vyo ubuvuzi gusa. Mu myaka ya 2000, amakuru yavuga ko ibice 70% vy'urumogi rwagurishwa muri Afrika y'Epfo rwava muri ico gihugu ca Lesotho. Abarimyi bo mu gihugu ca Lesotho basanzwe barima urumogi mu ntumbero yo kurukoresha mu mihana iwabo, hamwe no kurugurisha hanze kubera ubukene basanzwe babamwo. Usanga abanyagihugu bato bato barima urumogi bakarurimana n'ibindi biterwa nk'ibigori kugira ngo barushore muri Afrika y'Epfo. Igihugu ca Zimbabwe naco nyene giherutse kwemera ko urumogi rushobora kurimwa rukimburwa muri ico gihugu, ni inyuma y'aho cemereye ikoreshwa ryarwo muvyo ubuvuzi n'ubushakashatsi mu 2018. Zambia yoyo iherutse gutangaza ko ubu vyemewe n'amategeko gutunganya urumogi no kururungika mu mahanga ku mpamvu z'urudandaza n'ubuvuzi. Leya y'ico gihugu yafashe ico cemezo mu nama yayo yabaye ku wa 04 z'ukwa 12 kw'umwaka uheze nk'uko vyatangajwe na Dora Siliya avugira leta. Ikindi gihugu gikoresha urumogi ku rugero runini cane ni Korea y'Uburaruko, aho mbere n'amashirahamwe ya reta aja kurugurisha mu bindi bihugu kugira baronke amahera y'agaciro. Abashakashatsi bavuga ko bitazwi neza ko hoba hariho amategeko abuza ikoreshwa ry'urumogi, kandi ico gihugu ntikibona ko ikoreshwa ry'urumogi ari ukurenga ku mategeko.

column2: Indonesia: Abarenga 170 baraye bapfuye mu kajagari kadutse mu mupira w’amaguru
column3: Abantu n’imuburiburi 174 nibo bamaze kumenyekana ko bapfiriye mu musunikano wadutse igihe hariko haba urukino rw’umupira w’amaguru, rimwe mu masanganya mabi cane kw’isi amaze kubera mu kibuga. Ababa 180 barakomerekeye muri uwo musunikano inyuma y’aho umurwi Arema FC utsindiwe muhira  2-3  n’umurwi w’abakeba ruhebwa wa Persebaya Surabaya muri ico kibuga cari carengeje  abantu mu karere ka Malanga, intara ya East Java. Ibi vyabaye igihe abapolisi batera ivyuka bikoroza amosozi abafana bari binjiye mu kibuga ku mugoroba  w’ejo ku wa gatandatu. Umwe mu mabibonye, yitwa Dwi, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Kompas co muri Indonesia gikorera ku rubugua ngurukanabumenyi  ko yabonye “abantu benshi bahonyanzwe” bariko bagerageza guhunga. Umushikiranganji ajejwe umutekano muri ico gihugu avuga ko ico kibuga, ku bantu bangana na 38.000 categerezwa kwakira carengejeko 4000. Perezida Joko Widodo yategetse ko inkino zose zitegekanijwe mw’ihiganwa ryo mu cicaro ca mbere muri Indonesia zihagarara gushika amatohoza arangiye. Ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru kw’isi, FIFA, rivuga ko “ata vyuka” bikwiye kwinjizwa canke gukoreshwa n’abazamu canke abapolisi mu gihe c’inkino. Amavidewo yerekana abafana biruka mu kibuga ifirimbi ya nyuma ivugijwe, ari naho igipolisi caca gisukira ivyuka bikoroza amosozi. Nico Afinta arongoye igipolisi muri East Java avuga ati: "Haciye haduka akajagari. Batanguye gutera abapolisi, bamenagura amamodoka”. Yongerako y’uko aba polisi babiri bari mu bapfuye. Ati: "Twashaka kumenyesha ko…atari bose bateye akajagari. Ni abababa 3000 gusa binjiye hagati mu kibuga”. Yongerako y’uko mu guhunga, abafana "biteye ku muryango umwe gusa w’isohokero. Abantu babaye umurengera, rero mu musunikano bamwe babuze impemu”. Amavidewo yahanahanywe ku mbuga hwaniro yerekana abafana burira ku mpome z’uruzitiro mu guhunga, ayandi mavidewo yerekana abantu bapfuye barambaraye hasi. Ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru rya Indonesia (PSSI) rivuga ko ryatanguje amatohoza, rikongerako y’uko iri sanganya “ryacafuje ishusho y’umupira w’amaguru muri Indonsenia”. Imigumuko mu gihe c’inkino z’umupira w’amaguru si ikintu gishasha muri Indonesia, kandi Arema FC na Persebaya Surabaya ni abakeba kuva kera. Abafana ba Persebaya Surabaya barabujijwe kugura amatike muri uru rukino ku bwoba bw’uko bari guteza akajagari. Ariko umushikiranganji w’umutekano Mahfud MD yanditse kuri Instagram ko amatike 42.000 y’urwo rukino yagurishirijwe ku kibuga ca Kanjuruhan. Perezida Widodo yasavye ko iri riba “isanganya rya nyuma mu mupira w’amaguru mu gihugu” inyuma yo gutegeka ko inkino zose zo mu cicaro ca mbere zibangira mu kurindira amatohoza. Muhamad Dipo Maulana w’imyaka 21, yari yagiye kurorera urwo rukino, nawe avuga ko yabonye ingene vyose vyatanguye n'ingene vyabandanije. Yabwiye igisata ca BBC gikoresha ururimi rw’iki-indoneziya ko inyuma y’uru rukino, abafana bababa batandatu ba Arema binjiye mu kibuga baja aho abakinyi bayo bari kugira ngo berekane akababaro kabo. Ubwo nyene igipolisi caciye kibahagarika, kirabakubita gushika aho bagwa hasi. Niho abandi bafana baca binjira mu kibuga biyamiriza ingene aba bapolisi bakubise aba bafana bagenzi babo, gushika aho ibintu biba “urudubi”, nk’uko uyu yavyiboneye abivuga. Dipo avuga kandi ati: "Abapolisi bafise imbwa n'inkinzo, hamwe n'abasirikare baciye ba banguka". Dipo avuga ko yabonye abantu bataye umutwe, buzuye ubwoba vyanka n’uko bahema mu gihe bariko bagerageza kuva mu kibuga. Avuga kandi ko hari n’abana benshi hamwe n’abatama ibi vyuka vyagizeko ingaruka mbi. Aka kajagari niko gaheruka mu rukurikirane runini rw’amasanganya mabi amaze kubera mu bibuga. Mu 1964 abantu bashika 320 barapfuye abandi nabo barenga 1000 barakomereka mu kajagari kadutse mu rukino rwo kurondera itike yo mu nkino za Olempike hagati ya Peru na Argentina rwabereye i Lima, umugwa mukuru wa Peru. Mu 1985, abantu 39 barapfuye abandi nabo 600 barakomereka ku kibuga ca Heysel i Buruseri (Bruxelles/Brussels ) mu Bubirigi, igihe abafana basunikiwe ku rukuta rugaca rubomoka, hari mmu rukino rwa nyuma rw’igikombe ca Bulaya hagati ya Liverpool yo mu Bwongereza na Juventus yo mu Butaliyano. Mu Bwongereza, harabaye uguhonyorana ku kibuga ca Hillsborough mu karere ka Sheffield, bituma abafana 97 ba Liverpool bari bagiye kurorera urukino rw’igice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma rw’igikombe ca FA (FA Cup) rwayihuza na Nottingham Forest bahasiga ubuzima.

column2: Mu Burundi malaria yoba yabaye ikiza?
column3: Abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Leta y'Uburundi bafadikanije n'abaserukira ishami ry'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rijejwe amagara y'abantu OMS, bariko barihweza icatumye ingwara ya malaria ifata abantu benshi muri uyu mwaka kuruta uko vyahora. Ibiro vya ONU bijejwe gutunganya ibikorwa vy'ubutabazi OCHA, bimenyesha ko ibitigiri vya malaria yabonetse ku barwayi kuva mu ntango z'uyu mwaka, bigeze kuri 5 700 000, nayo abo yahitanye bagera ku 1800. Nimwumvirize uwuserukira  OMS mu Burundi, Kazadi Mulombo. Avuga ko bariko bafashanya na leta gukora ibishoboka ngo iyo ngwara igabanuke, ariko yirinze kuvuga ko igeze ku rugero rwo kwitwa ikiza canke kwemeza ibiharuro bivugwa, kuko leta ari yo ibishinzwe.

column2: Abayabaga bari barihebuye ko batazokwigera basubira gutambuka
column3: Na Naomi Grimley Umunyamakuru mu gisata c'amagara, Dakar Mu gihe Afrika yagize inama ya mbere ku bugaru (ibirenge by’indosho) -ubumuga buvukana umwe ku bantu 800 kw’isi – BBC yagendeye ibitaro vyo muri Senegal kuraba aho  ukuvura ubwo bumuga bihindura ubuzima. Mu minsi iheze, Serigne w‘imyaka 14 ntiyubahuka kuva mu nzu. Yarashobora gutambuka buke buke atanyaruka, ariko – kubera yavukanye ibirenge vyompi biraba inyuma – vyaramutera isoni cane. Bamwe baratwenga ingene atambuka, abandi bakamutinya bagatangura no kumwita amatazirano. Ariko ubu inyuma y’amezi atandatu, ibirenge vyiwe vyarahindutse, ubu indoto ziwe zo gukinira Senegal umupira w’amaguru zisa n’izishoboka. Serigne  afise ubugaru, ubu akaba ari mu rugendo rwo kubukosora. Buri mwaka, abana 200,000 baravukana ubugaru. Ku bw’ishirahamwe ry’abagiraneza MiracleFeet, ku bantu miriyoni 10 bakiriho bavukanye ubugaru,  abashika miriyoni 8 ntibigeze baronka amahirwe y’uko bukosorwa. Senegal iri mu bihugu bitanguye gukoresha vuba Ponseti – ubuhinga  bwo gukosora ubugaru bwiswe gutyo  hafatiwe kw’izina ry’umuganga w’umu-Espagnol yabutoye – ugereranije n’ibindi bihugu. Malawi na Uganda, nk’akarorero, biri mu bihugu vyatanze na bimwe bimwe vy’i Buraya kwemera ko ubwo buhinga bushobora gufasha. Ariko abanganga b’abanya-Senegal ubwo buhinga barabunonosoye gusumba uko bwari mu ntango, ubu bakaba babukoresha mu gukosora ubugaru ku bana b’imiyabaga mbere n’abakuze bari bazi ko bamaze kurenza imyaka yo gukosorwa. Nyina wa Serigne aranezerewe cane n’ingene umuhungu wiwe ariko aratera imbere. Nta muntu amurusha kumenya  umubabaro n’ububabare biterwa n’ubwo bumuga. “Umunsi umwe yarigeze kwanka kuva i muhira iminsi itatu.  Vyarambabaje cane ku mutima. Ariko ubu turanezerewe.” Hakoreshejwe ubwo buhinga, buri indwi, umuntu baramushirako isima kugira ihindukize buke buke ikirenge gitumbere neza. Ariko kubera we ubugaru bwiwe bwari bukaze cane, yashizweko isima incuro 20 mu mayinga nk’ayo nyene, ariko ubundi muri rusangi ni hagati ya gatanu n’umunani. Nk’uko bigenda kenshi iyo gukosora biri hafi kurangira, biba ngombwa ko abagwa kugira babohore “Tendon d’Achilles” [Ikigango) yiwe ariko ubundi ubwo buhinga ntibusaba kubagwa. Iciza gusumba, burazimbutse, ntiburinda gukoreshwa n’abaganga karuhariwe, kandi bukora neza cane – 90 % y’abana bakosowe imbere y’uko barenza imyaka ibiri bagira ikirenge gikora neza, mu gihe kubagwa bishobora kuzana izindi ngorane. Ubudasa buratangaje cane iyo uravye  amasanamu ya video ya Serigne imbere y’uko atangura gukosorwa. Mu minsi iheze, Serigne yarashizweko isima ya nyuma. Inyuma y’aho, azokenera kugirishwa ibikorwa ngoraramubiri kugira afashwe kumenyera guhagarara ku maguru yiwe Kandi mu minsi ya mbere azokwambara urwego  ku maguru kugira agumize ibirenge uruhande rumwe, ariko kazoza kiwe kerekeza heza. Fatou, uwundi mwana ariko aravurwa muri ivyo bitaro vya Dakar, yakoze urugendo rwa 400km kugira nawe akosorerwe ikirenge ciwe  c’i buryo. Ubu ageze ku myaka 13 ariko umuforoma mukuru, Nicanor Manga, aramwizeza ko  ikirenge ciwe kizokosorwa mu nyuma agatambuka neza.  Fatou avuga ko kubera aba kure cane, ntiyigeze yishiramwo ko ikirenge ciwe cokosowe. Kuba bizofata umwanya avyakira neza. Kuja kw’ishure ntivyoroshe – kubona abandi bana bari kumwe basimbasimba -mu gihe Fatou nawe yaba agendera ku bibando (bequilles). “Ivyo nifuza vyose, nta na kimwe nashobora. Ariko ni nakira, nzoshobora gukora ivyo nshaka.” Aho harimwo gukora kugira ashike ku ndoto yiwe yo kuba umuganga. Ariko si bose bagira amahirwe. Fata nka Oumou Barry w’imyaka 32, nk’akarorero. Igihe twamugendera muri Lac Rose, akarere ko mu nkengera y’umurwa mukuru wa Senegal, Dakar, yatweretse ikirenge ciwe gihetamye kandi kimeze nk’ikigaramye. Agendera ku ruhande rw’ikirenge kandi ububabare butuma adashobora gushika kure. Ubuzima bwiwe bwarabaye iciro ry’umugani kubera ubugaru, ariko aravuga ubwana bwiwe amasozi amutanga hasi. “Nahora mbaza mama igituma meze gutyo? Akanyishura ati: ‘Niko Imana yabishatse’ hanyuma uvuka gutyo.’” Oumou yaciye  mu bituma n’abandi benshi muri Senegal  bihebura ntibarondere ubuvuzi. Yavuze ko igihe ciwe camugoye cane ari igihe yari imyaka y’ubuyabaga, igihe abagenzi biwe batangura kwambara ibirato birebire, nawe agategerezwa kwama yambaye isandare gusa. Amaherero, yaruhiye guheba ishure- kuko ntiyaragishoboye kwihanganira kwama ariko araterwa amajambo. Yahavuye anaheba icigwa co kubarira kuko yasanzwe guhonyora ipedali y’imashini (icarahani) bibabaza cane. Oumou  afise umugabo n’abana babiri, ubuzima bwiwe si nyamwigendako nk’uko hari abaciye baharirwa ivomo kubera ubugaru, ariko n’ubu arumva ko abuze vyinshi kubera ubwo bumuga bugaragara butuma adashibora gukora akazi. Arira yagize ati: “Nta kintu gifadika mfise”. Aho bibabarije, kubera imyaka afise kandi  akaba yarabazwe ntivyagenda neza, Oumou ntashobora gukosorwa hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa Ponseti. Abakuze barashobora gukosorwa neza na Ponseti, ariko biragira cane gusumba kuko ibirenge vyabo bitaba bicoroshe cane Kenshi, ibituma umuntu avukana ubugaru ntibitahurwa neza, n’ubwo abahungu bafise ivyago biruta incuro zibiri ivy’abakobwa vyo kubuvukana. Benshi mu babuvukana kw’isi bari mu bihugu bikenye n’ibifise amikoro abayabaye, kubera urugero runini rw’abavuka, kandi mu bihugu bikenye ni ho akenshi ubwo bumuga budakosorwa. Umwe mu bagore yiyemeje guhebera ubuzima bwiwe gufasha kugira ntihagire abantu benshi  bakurana ubugaru ni  Aisha Mballo. Twahuriye w’isoko ryo mu gisagara ca Thies. Agendana igitabo kinini kirimwo amafoto. Ico gitabo gisigura ico arico ubugaru n’ingene ubuhinga bwa Ponseti bushobora kubukosora. Yaje ngaha kurondera aboba bafise ubugaru ubundi bashobora kuba ngaho bagakura atawubitayeho. Aisha avuga ko na we nyene ibirenge vyiwe bwari ubugaru gushika aho, mu myaka ya 1990 ari um myaka yiwe y’ubuyabaga, yarungikwa muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kubagwa. Ubu n’umukorerabushake  aserukira ishirahamwe ry’abagiraneza MiracleFeet, rihimiriza gupima, kuraba hakiri kare umwana ko atavukanye ubugaru. “Abantu bemeye ko umwana afise ubugaru hanyuma bakareka kumunyegeza, turashobora kubajana mu bitaro bagakosorwa.” Rosalind Owen wa Global Clubfoot Initiative, yize ibijanye n’ingene ubugaru bubonwa muri Afrika, avuga ko mu mico ya kera hari ingorane zikomeye nyinshi  zo kwigizayo uwufise  ubugaru”. Abantu bibaza ko wavumwe, canke ko warozwe, canke ko abavyeyi bawe hari ikintu kibi bakoze.” Aho harimwo kuvuga ko nyoko wawe yarenze ibigo kw’ico rero ari igihano. N’ubu abadashika 20% y’abafise ubugaru ni bo bakosorwa bakivuka muri Senegal , bivuze ko hakiri vyinshi vyo gukorwa. Imbere y’uko tuva Thies,  twaciye mu bindi bitaro kuraba uruyoya rw’umukobwa rw’indwi zibiri rwariko rurashirwako isima. Abaganga n’abaforoma bariko barabohera ama pansuma ku tuguru twiwe hanyuma bashirako isima itose hejuru. Iki nico gihe ciza co gukosora ubugaru. Mu cumba co kurindiriramwo, umwana w’umuhungu w’imyaka ibiri, ariko aratera igikarato cavuyemwo umutobe (jus/juice). Hari n'aho azohava avamwo umukinyi w’umupira w’amaguru. Ntashingura neza -  kuko ikirenge kimwe kiracari ubugaru – ariko nibura ariko arakosorwa.

column2: Umukinyi Ndikumana Selemani yakuwe ku rutonde rw'Intamba mu Rugamba muri CAN 2019
column3: Umusatirizi Ndikumana Yamini Selemani yakuwe ku rutonde rw'abakinyi 23 bagize umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Uburundi bagiye guserukira igihugu mu nkino z'ihiganwa ry'igikombe rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu ritangura kuri uyu wa gatanu i Cairo mu Misiri. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Burundi, FFB,  rikaba ririko rirahererekanwa ku mbunga hwaniro, iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe n'abamenyereza b'umurwi kubera indero nke uyo mukinyi yerekanye. FFB ivuga ko iyo nyifato iteye kubiri  « n'ivyumvikanyweko na bose mu ntumbero yo guserukira neza igihugu guhera kuwa 22 z'uku kwa gatandatu 2019 ». Ni kuri uyo munsi umurwi w'Intamba mu Rugamba uzoba ukinye urukino rwa mbere, aho uzohura na Super Eagles wa Nijeriya. Iryo tangazo rivuga ko « abandi bakinyi 22 bose bameze neza kandi barangwa n'ishaka ryo guhangana na Nijeriya » mu gisagara ca Alexandia.  Tubandanya tubakurikiranira iyo nkuru. Nibwo bwa mbere Uburundi bwinjiye muri izi nkino za nyuma z'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu vya Afrika. Kuri uyu wa gatanu, niho ryugururwa, aho igihugu ca Misiri cakiriye izo nkino kiza gutana mu mitwe n'igihugu ca Zimbabwe isaha zine mu masaha y'Uburundi n'u Rwanda. Akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko kaserukiwe n'ibihugu vya Uganda, Kenya, Uburundi na Tanzaniya.

column2: Igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi rikomeye kuri uyu mugoroba (19.08.2022)
column3: Umumenyereza wa Arsenal Mikel Arteta yavuze ko umukinyi w'imbere ku ruhande w'uwo mugwi, Bukaya Saka, yimirije gushira umukono ku masezerano mashasha. Yagize ati:"Mfise icizere kinini ko uruhande rwacu n'urwa Bukayo tuvyumva kumwe - igisigaye n'ukubishira mu nyandiko", (Romano via Arsenal.com) Arteta yavuze kandi ko umugwi wiwe ushaka kwihweza neza abakinyi ufise ubu imbere yo kwiyumvira kugura abandi bashasha mu mwanya usigaye w'igura n'igurishwa. "Ategerezwa kuba umukinyi mwiza, dushaka kuzana umukinyi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru, atari kuba ari umukinyi gusa." Umukinyi wa Real Madrid, Casemiro muri iki gitondo yasezeye abo bahora bakinana muri uwo mugwi inyuma yo kwemera kuja gukinira umugwi wa Manchester United. Umumenyereza wa Madrid, Carlo Ancelotti yemeje mu gitondo ko uwo mukinyi yimirije gusezera ikibuga ca Bernabéu. (Skysport) Umuyobozi mukuru wa Borussia Dortmund Hans-Joachim Watzke yamiriye kure inkuru zivuga ko uwo mugwi ushobora ugura Cristiano Ronaldo. Bivuye ku nkuru z'ikinyamakuru BILD co mu Budagi cavuze ko Dortmund ishobora kuzana uwo mukinyi wa Manchester United. Watzke yagize ati:"Ndamukunda, kuvugisha ukuri n'iciyumviro ciza - kubona Cristiano akinira kuri Signal Iduna Park. Ariko nta masezerano n'amwe dufitaniye, kuri ivyo rero tureke kubandanya tubivuga." (Sky sport football) Umumenyereza wa Newcastle Eddie Howe yabwiye Real Madrid ko yokwibagira kugerageza kugura umukinyi Bruno Guimaraes  bivuye ku nkuru zivuga ko bariko baragira inguvu zo kumugura. Uwo munye Brezil w'imyaka 24 yari yaguzwe amapawundi imiliyoni 40 mu kwezi kwa mbere mu mugwi wa Lyon, bamubona nk'uwushobora gusubirira Casemiro ariko arerekeza muri Machester United.

column2: Brussels: Bagiye kwitirira ibarabara indaya Eunice Osayande yishwe mu 2018
column3: Igisagara ca Bruxelles kivuga ko kigiye kwitirira ibarabara rishasha indaya y'umunya Nigeria aherutse kugandagurwa, nka kimwe mu bigize isekeza ryo guha iteka abakenyezi mu Bubirigi. Abarongoye iki gisagara bavuga ko iri barabara rizokwitirirwa Eunice Osayande, yishwe acumiswe imbugita n'umwe mu bakiriya biwe mu kwa gatandatu 2018. Uyu mwigeme yari yashitse ku mugwa mukuru w'Ububirigi mu 2016 yemerewe akazi keza kugira ngo yubake kazoza kiwe i Bulaya. Yari azi ko abagabo bamutumyeko bari abakinyi b'amareresi bari bagiye kumugira igihangange mu gukina ama filime. Ariko yasanze bari abacuruza abantu. Amaze kugera i Buruseri, ubwo nyene baciye bamuhatira mu bumalaya, akaba yabwiwe ko aheraniye aba bagabo ama-euros 45.000 arimwo ay'urugendo, agashimwe kabo hamwe n'uburaro. Indwi nkeya imbere y'igandagurwa ryiwe, yarituye ishirahamwe ry'abadandaza imibiri yabo aho yaribwiye ko yakubagurwa agatotezwa muri ako kazi kiwe. Yaratinya kuja kwitura igipolisi kubera ata bimuranga yari afise. Mu kwa gatandatu 2018, afise imyaka  23, Osayande yacumiswe n'umukiriya imbugita incuro 17 zose mu karere ka Gare du Nord. Haciye haduka imyiyerekano y'abimukira badandaza imibiri i Buruseri. Abayikoze basaba kworoherezwa mu kazi kabo, banasaba n'abategetsi b'akarere gushiraho amategeko agenga ico gisata. Amategeko ntabuza ubumaraya mu Bubirigi ariko nta tegeko rihuriweko na bose mu gihugu cose. Maxime Maes, arongoye ishirahamwe UTSOPI ry'abacuruza imibiri yabo i Buruseri, ni we yateguye iyi myiyerekano. Uyu mupfasoni yabwiye BBC ati: "Urupfu rwa Eunice rwarababaje cane abantu benshi, cane cane ku bimukira bakorera mu karere yakoreramwo". "Ubugizi bwa nabi bugenda bwiyongera muri ako karere, abagore ba ntahonikora bakaba ari bo babangamiwe cane". Umusore w'imyaka 17 ni we yagirijwe urupfu rwa Osayande akaba arindiriye gucirirwa urubanza. Bane mu bagize uyu murwi w'abacuruza abantu na bo nyene barahagaritswe, mu kwa mbere kw'uno mwaka, bakaba baciriwe iminyororo ishika ku myaka ine. Mu kwitirira ibarabara rishasha umupfasoni Osayande, igisagara ca Bruxelles kivuga ko gishaka gushira ahabona "abagore bose bazira urucuruza rw'abantu, ubugizi bwa nabi bushingiye ku gitsina hamwe n'ubwicanyi bukorerwa abagore". Iri barabara ni ryo rya mbere rizoba ryitiriwe indaya muri ico gihugu, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru RTBF co mu Bubirigi. Iri barabara rishasha ririko rirubakwa mu buraruko bw'igisagara ca Bruxelles ni rimwe mu yandi ari mu twigoro tw'abarongoye iki gisagara two kwitirira abagore ibibanza vyinshi. Hari amabarabara aza yaramaze kwitirirwa abagore batari bake, harimwo Yvonne Nèvejean na Andrée De Jongh bari mu barwanije aba Nazi b'Abadagi muri ya ntambara ya kabiri y'isi yose. Hari kandi n'ikiraro citiriwe Suzan Daniel, umubirigikazi yaharaniye agateka k'abari muri wa murwi w'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye. Ans Persoons ari mu barongoye iki gisagara avuga ko ibice 42% vy'abagore mu Bubirigi bari hagati y'imyaka 16 na 69 bamaze gukubagurwa mu buryo ubu canke buriya. "Uru rugero ni runini cane mu badandaza imibiri yabo. Iki ni co neza na neza gitumye Eunice Osayande yitirirwa ibarabara". Iri barabara ricubakwa ryitezwe kwugururwa icese mu mezi make ari imbere. Abarongoye iki gisagara bavuga ko imirwi y'abadandaza imibiri yabo hamwe n'abimukira bazotumirwa kugira bashikirize ijambo ku musi wo kuryugurura.

column2: Perezida Nkurunziza w'u Burundi hari ivyo asaba amadini kwirinda, rimwe rivuga ko 'rizovuga ukuri'
column3: Perezida Petero Nkurunziza w'Uburundi asaba abarongoye amadini ko bokwirinda kugwa mu mutego muri kino gihe u Burundi buriko bwitegurira amatora yo mu mwaka uza wa 2020. Amwe mu madini nka Ekleziya Katolika yoyo ivuga ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo. Mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije yibuka imyaka ine amaze atowe n'abanyagihugu ubwabo ku ncuro ya kabiri, Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ko bokwirinda "kugwa mu mutego w'abahanuzi b'ibinyoma n'inyigisho zikomoka hanze" avuga ko zitajanye n'ivy'Imana. Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ati: "Si ivy'imbeshere, bamwe mu bakozi b'Imana baraguye, abandi barakomereka bongera bakomeretsa abayoboke babo; babera umuzimagiza abo bajejwe aho kubabera urumuri n'icitegererezo". Ntadoma urutoke kw'idini iri canke ririya, gusa Ekleziya Katolika ni yo ikunze kwagirizwa ko yivanga mu vya politike. Bavuga ko ibi ibikora cane cane mu gihe ishikiriza aho ihagaze ku biraba ubuzima bw'igihugu mu butumwa bukunda gusomwa mu masengero yose ya Katolika mu gihugu. Abasenyeri ba Katolika bobo bamenyesha ko ata nyigisho za politike batanga, ahubwo ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo "kuko iyobokamana rirangukira mu buzima bw'abantu". Mu ndwi iheze, mu birori vy'uguhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Assomption, Pascal Nyabenda arongoye inama nshingamateka, yasavye abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika kuguma hagati na hagati, ntiberekane aho bahagaze mu vya politike kuko ngo bitsitaza abakirisu. Mu kumwishura, Umuvugizi w'inama y'abepiskopi mu Burundi, Yohakimu Ntahondereye, yamenyesheje ko bazovuga ijambo ry'Imana uko riri ata gucisha iruhande, "n'aho hari aho rigera rikababaza".

column2: Burundi: leta itangaza ko hari abandi 21 banduye Covid-19
column3: Leta y'Uburundi itangaza ko hari abandi barwari 21 bashasha banduye wa mugera karanda wa coronavirus. Mwitangazo ryasohowe nijoro n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu, abo 21 batowe mu bantu 202 biketswe ko banduye bapimwe hagati yo ku wa 27 gushika ku wa 30 z'ukwezi guheze kwa gatandatu. Iryo tangazo rimenyesha ko mu barwayi 54 bari basanzwe bariko baravurwa, batatu muri bo ari bo bapimwe bagasanga nta migera bagisigaranye. Umukuru w'igihugu aherutse gutangaza ko agiye kwitwararika gusumba kurwanya iki kiza, akaba mbere yaranatangaje ingingo zitandukanye mu ntumbero yo guhangana naco. Gushika ubu, ibiharuro vyerekana ko abantu 191 aribo bamaze kwandura uwo mugera; muri abo 118 bakaba bamaze gukira, nayo 72 bakaba ari bo bakirwaye, umwe akaba yaritavye Imana. Ubushikiranganji bubandanya busaba abanyagihugu gukurikiza ingingo zo kuzibira kwandura canke kwandura, izo nazo zikaba zirimwo gukaraba n'amazi meza n'isabuni canke arimwo umuti wica imigera. Ubwo bushikiranganji busaba kandi abanyagihugu kwirinda kuramukanya no guhoberana, kwirinda kwasamurira mu bandi, kwambara udupfukamunwa ku bavuzi, abarwaye covird-19 n'abamaranye umwanya b'abarwaye. U Burundi ni kimwe mu bihugu ata mategeko ruhasha vyafashe agamije kurwanya ikiza coronavirus, bikaba mbere vyaratumye bwiyamirizwa henshi mu makungu. Hagati aho, umukuru w'igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye aherutse kumenyesha ko atanguje urugamba rwo kurwanya ico kiza karanda. Mw'ijambo aherutse gushikiriza inama nshingamateka ku musi wo kuzahiza leta nshasha ku wa 30/06/2020, Perezida Ndayishimiye yatangaje ingingo zitari nke mu ntumbero yo kurwanya ico kiza. Yagize ati: "Turasavye umurundi wese, hamwe n'umunyamahanga ari muri iki gihugu guhaguruka kuko akatavuga ntigahenda akavuga". KLeta y'u Burundi iherutse kwirukana abaserukiye ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS biturutse ku kutabona kumwe ikibazo ca coronavirus. Hari n'abavuga ko leta yoba inyegeza ibitigiri nyavyo vy'abanduye uwo mugera, ivyo abategetsi b'u Burundi bamirira kure.

column2: Chris Brown yagirijwe ko yahaye ibiyayuramutwe umugore aca amusambanya ku nguvu mu bwato
column3: Chris Brown yagirizwa ko yahaye ibiyayuramutwe umugore aca aramusambanya ku nguvu, ubu akaba ariko mu rubanza rushobora kumutwara imiriyoni 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Iki caha co gufata ku nguvu kivugwa ko cabereye mu bwato (yacht) ku wa 30 kigarama (ukwa cumi na kabiri) 2020 i Miami mu ntara ya Florida. Ikiganiro Newsbeat ca Radio 1 cagerageje kuvugana n'abaserukira Chris Brown kugira ngo bagire ico bavuze ariko gushika ubu ntaco barishura. Chris Brown asa n'uwishuye aciye ku rubuga rwa Instagram, aho avuga ko ariko arakurikiranwa kubera ariko ategura gusohora umuziki. Yanditse ati: "NDIBAZA KO ARI IVYO MUBONA MWESE....ni igihe cose ngiye gusohora umuziki canke mfise imigambi kanaka". Uru rubanza rwugurujwe n'umunyamuziki atashatse kumenyekana, azwi gusa kw'izina rya 'Jane Doe' mu nzandiko z'amategeko. Izi nyandiko zerekana ibirego bitanu bitandukanye kuri uyu munyamuziki - gufata ku nguvu, ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina, guturubika n'ibigirankana, guturubika umuntu kubera urwangara hamwe no gupfunga umuntu atabifitiye uburenganzira kandi amuturubitse. Uyu mugore avuga ko afise "ubwoba ko ashobora kwicwa canke gutakaza akazi" . Avuga ko yahawe ubutumire muri ubwo bwato bwegukira umunyamuziki wo mu mudiho wa rap (rapper) akongera kaba n'umu 'producer',  Diddy, ari naho habereye iki caha kivugwa. Nk'uko uru rwandiko Newsbeat yashoboye kubona rubivuga, uyu mugore avuga ko amaze gushika, Brown  yamuhaye ikinyobwa mu nyuma aca yumva "umubiri urahindutse giturumbuka mu buryo atashobora gusigura". Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko "yataye umutwe, inguvu ziramuherana, aca afatwa n'itiro", imbere y'uko atwarwa mu gitanda ariho bivugwa ko Brown yaciye amwambura impuzu amusambanya ku nguvu. Brown avugwa ko ku musi wakurikiye yahamagaye uyo mugore, amubwira ko yofata imiti kugira ntasame imbanyi. Newsbeat kandi yagerageje no kuvugana n'abaserukizi ba Diddy, ariko nta nyishu baratanga.

column2: Igitero ca Russia: Putin aracarondera kwigarurira igice kinini ca Ukraine - Amerika
column3: Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya aracarondera kwigarurira igice kinini ca Ukraine, nk’uko bivugwa n’ibisata vya Amerika bijejwe igendereza. Hagati aho, abategetsi ba Amerika babona ko ingabo za Moscou ziruhishijwe cane n’iyi ntambara, bakabona ko ico bashoboye ubu ari ukwigarurira uduce duto tw’ubutaka bwa Ukraine. Bisigura ko iyi ntambara ishobora kumara igihe kirekire, nk’uko umukuru w’ikigo c’igihugu kijejwe igendereza, Avril Haines, abivuga. Mu kwa gatatu, Moscou yafashe ingingo yo gushira inguvu zose ku karere ka Donbas kari mu buseruko bwa Ukraine inyuma y’aho inaniriwe no gufata umugwa mukuru Kyiv n’ibindi bisagara. Putin aracafise intumbero zisa n’izo yari afise igihe intambara itangura, ukwigarurira Ukraine yose, nk’uko uyu mutegetsi mukuru w’igendereza rya Amerika Haines abivuga. Ariko, avuga ko Uburusiya bushobora kudashika kuri iyi ntumbero ubu bwa vuba.  Yabwiye inama y’ishami ry’ubucuruzi muri Amerika ati: "Hano turabona ko hari ubudasa hagati y’intumbero za gisirikare Putin ashaka mu kiringo gito, n’ubushobozi bw’igisirikare ciwe, bikaba bidahuye n’ivyo yifuza ndetse n’ivyo ingabo zishobora gushikako". Kuva aho bunaniriwe gushika ku ntumbero yabwo yo gufata Kyiv, Uburusiya bwibanze kwigarurira ubutaka mu karere ka Donbas  - akarere kagutse karimwo amahinguriro, Putin akitwaza ko Ukraine ikorera ihonyabwoko abavuga ikirusiya. Ingabo z’Uburusiya zarateye intambwe muri ako karere, aho ziherutse kwigarurira igisagara ca Severodonetsk, ariko zikaba zigenda bukebuke na rirya ingabo za Ukraine zibandanya zihagararako. Mw’ijambo rya mbere ashikirije icese kuva mu kwa gatanu ku vyerekeye ingene igendereza rya Amerika ribona iyi ntambara, umupfasoni Haines avuga ko igitero c’Uburusiya gishobora kubandanya “igihe kirekire” kandi ko “ishusho ibandanya iba mbi”. Avuga ko ibisata bijejwe igendereza bibona ibintu bitatu bishoboka ku kungene iyi ntambara ishobora kubandanya, ikintu gishoboka cane kikaba ari uko intambara ishobora kubandanya ku muvuduko muto, aho Uburusiya “buzogenda bufata uturere ariko ntihagire ico bifasha”. Ibindi bishoboka, ariko ku rugero ruto, harimwo ko Uburusiya bushobora gutera intambwe ikomeye, canke bugashobora gutsimbataza ibirindiro vyabwo ku rubuga rw'intambara,  Ukraine nayo igashobora gutera intambwe ntoya. Ibi bishobora gusigura ko Moscou ishobora gukoresha cane uburyo bw’intambara butamenyerewe mu gutera abansi bayo, harimwo n’ibitero nyabwonko, kugenzura amasoko ntanganguvu n’ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda vy’ubumara. Haines yashikirije aya majambo ejo ku wa gatatu inyuma y’aho abategetsi ba OTAN biyemeje gushigikira Ukraine mu gihe cose bizoba ari ngombwa – mu kwongereza ingabo zayo ku mugabane wose w’Ubulaya no mu kwemerera Finland na  Suède/Sweden kwinjira muri iri huriro ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe. Umunyamabanga mukuru wa OTAN Jens Stoltenberg avuga ko izi ari zo mpinduka zikomeye gusumba izimaze gukorwa inyuma ya ya ntambara y’ukwikekana (Guerre Froide/Cold War), aho Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika avuga ko OTAN   “izokomezwa mu buryo bwose ku mpande zose  - ku butaka, mu kirere no mu mazi”. Yishura ku kibazo c’uko ibi bihugu bibiri vyo mu Buraruko bishobora kwinjira mw’ishirahamwe OTAN, Perezida Putin yagirije iri huriro rya gisirikare ko ririko ryunyura icuka kibi n’ibigirankana. Igihe yari mu rugendo muri Turkmenistan, Putin yavuze ati: "Mu gihe ingabo n’ibikoresho vyoramuka birungitswe,  bizoba ngombwa ko [Uburusiya] bwihora”. Hagati aho, reta y’Ubwongereza yiteguye guha Ukraine imfashanyo ya gisirikare ingana n’imiriyaridi 1.2 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika, hafi incuro zibiri z’iyo Ubwongereza bumaze guha gushika ubu iki gihugu gihanganye n’Uburusiya. Amerika yonyene niyo imaze guha Ukraine imfashanyo isumba iy’Ubwongereza. Umukuru w’igihugu ca Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky avuga ko igihugu ciwe gikeneye imiriyaridi zababa zitanu z’amadorari y’abanyamerika buri kwezi kugira ngo gishobore guhangana n’Uburusiya.

column2: Iragi rya Bob Marley ryatewe iteka n’umwuzukuru wiwe mu giteramo i Birmingham
column3: Ibiserukuru bitatu vy’umuryango wa Bob Marley baza kuba bari mu giteramo co kuri uno wa kabiri mu gisagara ca Birmingham mu Bwongereza -  imyaka 50 inyuma y’igiteramo ca mbere uyu muririmvyi yagiriye muri ico gisagara. Umwuzukuru wiwe Skip Marley araza kuririmba muri kino giteramo kiza kuba gihagarariwe n’uwari umugore akongera akanafasha kuririmba uyu yahoze ari umunyamuziki rurangiranwa, Rita, ari kumwe n’umukobwa wiwe Cedella. Iki giteramo kiza kuba kigizwe n’indirimbo ziwe zisubirwamwo mu murwi w’abaririmvyi  Chineke! Orchestra  baza kuba bari kumwe na Skip n’abandi. Trevor Nelson niwe aremesha iki giteramo – kizocishwa kuri BBC hanyuma. Iki giteramo kiri mu bikorwa bitegekanijwe na BBC vyo guhimbaza imyaka 60 igihugu ca Jamaica  - ari co gihugu ciwe c’amavukiro - kimaze cikukiye, hamwe kandi no mu birori vyo gutanguza inkino za Commonwealth 2022 zitegekanijwe kubera i Birmingham. Skip Marley ati: "Nditeguye kuririmbana na Chineke! Mu gutera iteka umuziki wa Sokuru. “Kuririmba mu giteramo co mu Bwongereza aho umuziki wa sokuru usanzwe ukundwa cane rwose biza kuba ari ibintu bidasanzwe”. Skip Marley ni umunyamuziki w’imyaka 26 yavukiye muri Jamaica, nyina wiwe ni Cedella Marley umunyamuziki akomeye kandi yatsindiye  udushimwe dutatu twa Grammys awards akaba ari umukobwa wa Bob Marley. Haraciye imyaka 41 Bob Marley asandavye yishwe na kansei i Miami muri Reta Zujnze Ubumwe za Amerika, ku myaka 36.

column2: Burundi: Hilaire Manirakiza afasha abafise imbuga hwaniro kuduza ama 'vyuzi'
column3: Hilaire Manirakiza yize bimugoye kubera uburyo aho yagiye arahagarika ubu akaba akora akazi katamenyerewe rwose ko gufasha abafise imbuga hwaniro na YouTube kwongereza ababakurikirana (Views). Uwo musore avuga ko yize ivyerekeye ubuhinga bwa none bw'itumatumanako mu mashure yisumbuye, avuga ko yize bimugoye bituma atabandanya kaminuza. Avuga ati:"Nahagaritse imyaka itanu ntiga kubera ubukene, ngaruka kubandanya umwaka w'icenda abo twigana bahejeje. "Narasubiriye ndamara umwaka ntiga banyirukanye kuko nari maze imyaka ibiri ntariha amahera y'ishure." YouTube, iriha abafise 'accounts' bivanye n'igitigiri c'abaraba video bashirako n'igihe bazimarako. Mu Burundi hari benshi bamaze gushinga YouTube channels bashirako videos bafise intumbero yo gukorera ayo mafaranga, vyuzi rero ni wo mukate wabo. Kuri Manirakiza n'abafise ubuhinga nk'ubwiwe n'abo guha vyuzi abo bafise. Ni ubuhinga bushasha bwo kurondera amahera n'aho hari abanebagura uko bukora, hamwe  n'ubwoko bw'amakuru ashirwa kuri izo mbuga mu kurondera vyuzi. Hilaire Manirakiza avuga ko agiheza ishure yaciye aronka akazi ko gufata amasanamu ku mboneshakure yo ku mbuga hwaniro, ariko mu nyuma amasezerano bari bafitaniye aza guhagara. Avuga ko yaciye yigira inama yo kwiga uko yobaho mu gufasha abafise imbuga hwaniro kuduza ama 'vyuzi' (views). Agira ati:"Abafise imbuga hwaniro bampemba hakurikijwe igikorwa bantumye ico ari co. "Uwo mfashije kuronka nk'ama vyuzi 1000 ku musi, ampa ibihumbi 15 vy'amarundi. "Birantunze kuko kuva bampagaritse ku kazi, inzu nguma ndayiriha uko nahora, gufungura canke kwambara ni kwa kundi." Mu kwezi kumwe amaze atanguye ico gikorwa, Manirakiza Hilaire amaze gufasha abantu barenga cumi kuduza ama vyuzi. N'akazi akorera aho ari ho hose, kuri telefone ngendanwa canke ku nyabwonko, ariko akavuga ko afise umugambi wo kwugurura ibiro vyo gukoreramwo. Ahanura urundi rwaruka kwicara rufise ikintu ruzi gukora ku buryo n'aho bokwirukana mu kazi k'ivyo wigiye, ushobora guca wikorera ivyawe.

column2: Akazi: Woshika gute ku bintu vyinshi ukoresheje umwanya muto?
column3: Ukivyumva, bishobora kuba ata nsiguro bifise. Wokora gute umwanya muto kugira uronke umwimbu mwinshi? Aha turabasigurira ingene ivyo bishoboka n'ingene bishobora kubafasha mu migambi imwe imwe. Cal Newport, ikigo c'ubuhinga mu kugwiza umwimbu, kiratanga impanuro ku kungene ushobora akazi ku rwenge. Izo mpanuro harimwo ikintu citwa "gukora udakebaguzwa". Mu gutahura ico ari co gukora udakebaguzwa, birakenewe kumenya ico ari co akazi kadashemeye. Kusoma ubutumwa bwa mail, kuraba imbuga hwaniro, gukoresha amanama ku bintu bitihuta cane, ivyo vyose bishobora gufatwa nk'akazi kadashemeye. Ushobora kutavyirengagiza gose, ariko ushobora kubikura ku rutonde rw'ibintu vyo gukora mu mwanya umwe, kugira wihatire ku kandi kazi udakebaguzwa. N'ukwihatira cane ku bikorwa bikenewe cane no kuvyitondera cane. Ushobora no kwiherera kugira ntusamare. Ni vyo umwanditsi Maya Angelou yakunda gukora, mu gihe umugwizatunga Bill Gates azwi nk'umuntu yakunda kwiyugarana ahantu hiherereye kugira akore. Hari uburyo bwinshi bwo gushika ku ntumbero mu buzima. Umugwizatunga Warren Buffet ahanura kugira urutonde rw'ibintu 20 nkenerwa vyo gukora mu buzima, hanyuma ugaca akarongo musi y'ikigira gatanu. Hanyuma, ibindi 15 biri kuri urwo rutonde ivyihoze, gushika ubonye uhejeje ivyo bitanu vya mbere. Umwarimu wa kaminuza Angela Duckworth n'umuhinga muvyo inyifato yateguye indinganizoy'intumbero umuntu yipfuza gushikako. N'ukubigaburamwo ibice vyinshi, ikija hejuru kikaba ari co gekenewe cane (nko kuba umuganga canke gutwara umudari wa olempike). Intera ikurikira irimwo intumbero zito zito zikenewe kugira ushike ku ntumbero nyamukuru. Nk'akarorero, ubushakashatsi bukenewe kugira ukore ibibazo vyotuma uba umunyeshure wa kaminuza muvyo amagara y'abantu, canke imyimenyerezo ikenewe kugira wirukw imetero 100 kugira uronke umudari w'inzahabu. Intera yo hasi irimwo ibikorwa bishigikira ibiri mu ntera yo hejuru, gutyo gutyo gutyo. Mu gihe akazi kamwe katagushikana ku ntumbero nyamukuru, intera iyo ari yo yose kariko, ntugakore. Gukora umusi wose akazi ku muvuduko wa 100km/h si ikintu ciza. Akaruhuko karakenewe, kandi nawe karashobora kugufasha. Francesco Cirillo, umuhinga mu gukoresha neza umwanya, yaratoye igipimo c'akaruhuko ku cuma giharura iminota gifise iforoma y'urutomati yasanze mu gikoni ciwe. Ubwo buhinga buzwi kw'izina rya pomodoro (kivuye mw'izina urutomati mu gitaliyano), bukora mu kugabura akazi kawe mi bice vy'iminota 25. Ugakurikizako iminota 5 y'akaruhuko ifasha mu mwimbu. Sohoka hanze gutembera gato hakuguma uraba imbuga hwaniro - ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko utwo turuhuko dushobora umererwa neza gusumba mu kwitegurira iyindi minota 25 y'akazi. Cal Newport arafise uko afata akazi umuntu adakebaguzwa, ariko arazi kandi kugahagarika no kugira umwanya wiwe. Kugira aheraheze umusi w'akazi, yari afise akamenyero ko guhagarika. N'ukuvuga kumenya ko umusi uheze, kwihweza akazi katashoboye kurangira, gutegura ibizokorwa bukeye, no kugara inyabwonko ngendanwa canke ikaye y'imyimenyerezo no kuvuga ijambo nka "ndaheje kugara burundu". Uko wobivuga kose bikuvako, ariko ayo majambo ategerezwa kwerekana ko uhejeje akazi k'uyo musi n'intango y'akaruhuko, ko widegemvya ushobora kwinezereza. Ako kanya utegerezwa kukaronka! column2: Kubera iki Esther Nish yaririmvye indirimwo "Kavorivori"?
column3: Umuririmvyi w'umurundikazi azwi nka Esther Nish yaganiriye na BBC Gahuzamiryango mu kiganiro c'abakenyezi. column2: Papa Francis yagenye abakardinali bashasha: Harimwo Umunyarwanda Antoine Kambanda
column3: Papa Francis ahejeje gutangaza amazina y'abakardinali bashasha 13 muri bo hakaba harimwo Musenyeri mukuru wa Kigali, Antoine Kambanda. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda ni we Munyarwanda wa mbere agenywe kuba umukardinali. Muri abo 13, icenda bari munsi y'imyaka 80, bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu murwi w'abakardinali bashobora gutora umusubirizi wa Papa mu gihe yokwitaba Imana canke agatanga imihoho. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda afise imyaka 61, yavukiye mu Bugesera, mu 2018 nibwo Papa Francis yamugize Musenyeri mukuru (Arkepiskopi) wa Kigali canke umukuru wa Ekleziya Gatolika mu Rwanda. Kambanda yize amashuri mato n'ayisumbuye mu Burundi, muri Uganda no muri Kenya imbere yo kurangiza  ivyigwa vya Tewolojiya muri Seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda mu Rwanda. Inyandiko za Ekleziya mu Rwanda zivuga ko mu kwezi kwa cenda mu 1990 aribwo Papa Paul II yamugize umupatiri. Kuva mu 1993 yagiye kwiga i Roma aho yavanye impamyabushobozi y'ikirenga muri Tewolojiya. Inyuma y'amashuri yiwe, igihe kinini yari umwigisha muri seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda, aza no kuyiyobora kugeza mu 2013. Muri uwo mwaka wa 2013 nibwo Papa Francis yamugize musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Kibungo kugeza mu 2018 ahabwa amabanga yo kuyobora kiliziya mu Rwanda. Kardinali ni rwo rwego rukuru rwo mu butegetsi bwa ekleziya umuntu ashobora kugerako imbere yo kuba Papa, umuyobozi wa Ekleziya Gatolika kw'isi. Ekleziya Gatolika yari isanzwe ifise abakardinali 219, muri abo 29 gusa ni bo bo muri Africa, mu gihe igihugu nk'Ubutaliyano conyene gifise abakaldinali 41. Ibihugu vya Africa bisanzwe bifise abakardinali ni: Aba bakardinali bashasha 13 batowe na Papa Francis bazemezwa kuri iyo mirimo kw' igenekerezo 28 z'ukwezi kwa 11 nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru ya Vatican. Muri bo harimwo uwitwa Mauro Gambetti yari asanzwe ari umupatiri. Urwego rw'abakardinali rumeze nka reta ya Papa. Bamwe bakorera i Vatican abandi baguma bakorera mu bihugu vyabo bakajayo igihe batumijwe. Amategeko abagenga avuga ko Abakardinali igikorwa cabo ca mbere ari ugutora umu Papa mushasha iyo uwusanzwe ahari apfuye canke avuye mu mirimo. Gusa muri bose, 120 ni bo baba bagize inama itora Papa mushasha. Bashingwa kandi iyindi mirimo itandukanye harimwo gukurikirana ibikorwa vy'abasenyeri, guhagararira amashuri ya Ekleziya, ivugabutumwa, eka bakagira n'inteko ijejwe sentare zitatu za ekleziya. Abakardinali ariko kandi baba bajejwe guhagararira diyoseze n'imiburiburi zibiri canke zirenga mu bihugu bakomokamwo. Abakardinali bambara ibara ry'umutuku kuvyo amategeko ya katolika asobanura ko baba "biteguye kumena amaraso yabo mu gukorera uwo basubiriye intumwa Petero."

column2: Mary Jackson: NASA igiye kwitirira icicaro cayo umuhinga w’umwiraburekazi
column3: Ikigo kijejwe ingendo zo kwiga ikirere NASA kigiye guhindura izina ry'icicaro caco kicitirire umuhinga m'umwiraburekazi wa mbere, Mary Jackson. Uwurongoye NASA Jim Bridenstine avuga ko Jackson yafashije cane mu gukuraho inzitizi ku banyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika n'abagore mu biraba ubuhinga. Amakuru ya Mary Jackson  yavuzwe mw'ireresi yasohotse mu 2016 yiswe Hidden Figures (Abantu banyegejwe).Yari yavukiye ahitwa Hampton mu ntara ya Virginia, asandaba mu 2005. Mu mwaka uheze, NASA yaritiriye ibarabara riri hanze y'ikigo cayo Hidden Figures Way. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, Bridenstine yavuze ati: "Ntibakinyegejwe, tuzobandanya kwibuka intererano y'abagore, Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika, hamwe n'abandi bantu b'amamuko yose bitanze kugira ngo ibikorwa vya NASA vyo kwiga ikirere bishoboke". "Mary W Jackson ni umwe mu murwi w'abagore bakomeye cane bafashije NASA kugira ngo ishoboze abahinga b'ikirere ba Amerika gushobora kuzunguruka mu kirere". "Mary ntiyigeze yemera ko ibintu biguma uko vyari biri, yarafashije gukuraho inzitizi arugururira inzira Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika hamwe n'abagore mu gisata c'ubuhinga". Iyo ngingo ije inyuma y'aho Abanyamerika bakubise agatima mpembero bakihweza akarenganyo Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika bakorewe kuva kera. Urupfu ruheruka rw'umwirabure George Floyd yapfiriye mu gasho k'igipolisi rwatumye haba imyiyerekano kw'isi yose basaba ko ivanguramoko riranduranwa n'imizi. Mu myaka ya 1940, NASA niho yatanguye guha akazi abagore b'Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika bakoreshwa nk'ico bise "inyabwonko-muntu" (Human computers), ariko bakaba bagiye bahura n'ibibazo vy'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba no ku gitsina. Mary Jackson yahawe akazi mu 1951 n'ikigo National Advisory Committee for Aeronautics cagiye huginduka kikitwa NASA mu 1958. Yatwarwa na Dorothy Vaughan - nawe nyene yavuzwe muri ya reresi Hidden Figures - mu gisata cakoramwo abahinga mu biharuro bakoreshwa 'nk'inyabwonko-muntu' mu karere ka Langley k'intara ya Virginia. Jackson yapfuye mu 2005 akaba yararonkejwe ikidari c'inzahabu gihabwa ibihangange vy'itavye Imana. Umukobwa wiwe, Carolyn Lewis avuga ko ari iteka rinini ku muryango kubona NASA ibandanya kwibuka iragi rya Mary Jackson. Ati: "Yari umuhinga, umugiraneza, umugore, nyina w'abana akaba n'intwari yaciriye inzira abandi ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vyatumye bagira ico bashitseko, atari muri NASA gusa, ariko n'ahandi hose mu gihugu cose".

column2: New York: Urubanza rwa R Kelly kw'ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina rwatanguye
column3: Urubanza rw'uyu muririmvyi wo muri Amerika aririmba umudiho wa R&B rwatanguriye muri sentare yi Brooklyn i New York. Iki camamare cagirizwa amagendu, guhohotera bifatiye ku gitsina hamwe no gutanga igiturire; ivyaha amaze guhakana inshuro nyinshi. Bimwe mu vyaha bishinjwa uyu muririmvyi - asanzwe yitwa Robert Sylvester Kelly - ni ivyo kuva mu myaka 20 iheze. Niyahamwa n'ivyaha vyose yagirizwa arashobora gupfungwa imyaka mirongo. Amajambo atanguza urubanza yasomewe amugwi w'abanyagihugu baca urubanza (jury) ugizwe n'abagabo indwi hamwe n'abagore batanu, bakazofata icemezo ku coshikira uyu muririmvyi w'imyaka 54. Kelly yagirizwa kuba yari kizigenza mu gikorwa camaze imyaka mirongo ibiri aho haronderwa abagore hamwe n'abakobwa badakwije imyaka bagashorwa mu busambanyi. Icegera c'umushinjacaha Maria Melendez mw'ijambo ritanguza urubanza yavuze yuko "uru rubanza rwerekeye "inyamaswa y'impigi". Yavuze ko R Kelly "ari umuntu yakoresheje ibinyoma, kuryosharyosha, gutera ubwoba hamwe no gukoresha inguvu mu kuganza abo yahohotera kandi abikora yidegemvya mu kiringo c'imyaka myinshi". Kelly yagirizwa kuba yarabwiriza abo yahohotera kwerekana ko "bamwihaye rwose" kandi bakubaha ataguharira amategeko yiwe yose, harimwo yuko bafungura canke bakaja mu bwiherero ari uko abahaye uruhusha, ntibarabe abandi bagabo, kandi bakamwita "Daddy" (Papa). R Kelly yavuze ko ari umwere kuri ivyo vyose yagirizwa kandi ahakana yivuye inyuma ko ata kibi na kimwe yakoze. Uru rubanza, rwasibijwe kenshi kubera ikiza ca covid kandi rukaba rwitezwe kumara nk'ukwezi kumwe, vyitezwe ko ruvugirwamwo ivyagiriji vy'ihohotera ryakozwe na Kelly, harimwo ubuhamya bwa bamwe mu bagore hamwe n'umugabo ashika kuri umwe bamwagiriza. Naho yogirwa umwere, Kelly arindiriwe n'ibidi vyagiriji bifatiye ku gitsina muri Illinois na Minnesota, aho naho akaba yarahakanye ivyo ahagirizwa. Kelly amaze imyaka ibiri mw'ibohero. Yimuriwe i Brooklyn mu kwezi kwa gatandatu akuwe i Chacago ku bw'uru rubanza. Uyu mugabo w'imyaka 54 azwi cane ku ndirimbo ziwe zakunzwe zirimwo Ignition (Remix), I Believe I can Fly, Bump n'Grind na If I Could Turn Back the Hands of Time. Ari mu nzira yerekeza aho urubanza rubera, umuhinguzi w'ibiganiro wa BBC, Monica Miller yagize ati; "Ni umunsi wa gatatu udasanzwe i Brooklyn. Abashigikiye R. Kelly bariko bararengana bavugira hejuru bati "Rekura R Kelly". Kelly hamwe n'abakorana nawe bagirizwa kurondera abagore n'abakobwa batarakwiza imyaka bakabashora mu busambanyi budakurikije amategeko hamwe n'uwo muririmvyi. Ivyo vyagiriji ni ivyo kuva mu myaka y'1990, vyinshi bikibanda ku bifatwa nk'uruhigi rwarondera abakobwa b'imiyabaga. Kuri ubu R Kelly akurikiranywe mu maleta menshi agize Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ivyagiriji bikaba birimwo guhohotera bifatiye ku gitsina, guhohotera uwutarakwiza imyaka, gufata amasanamu y'urukozasoni y'abatarakwiza imyaka, igiturire hamwe no kunaniza ubutungane. Ubushinjacaha bwashingiye urubanza ku bagore batandatu batavuzwe amazina. Ivyagiriji icenda vyashizwe imbere bivuga ku kugirira nabi abantu bo mu ciswe Jane Doe, batatu muri bo bikavugwa ko bari batarakwiza imyaka y'ubukuru igihe bahohoterwa. Abashingwamanza ba Kelly vyitezwe ko bavuga yuko bimwe muri ivyo vyagiriji ari ivy'abagore bari baramukunze ariko ntibaronke ico bashaka, mu gihe mu ntango bari bemeye guhuza ibitsina nawe.

column2: Prezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yatangaje iduzwa ry’amakori mu kwihora Ubushinwa
column3: Prezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yatangaje ko agiye kwihora igihugu c'Ubushinwa mu kuduza amakori ku bidandazwa biva muri ico gihugu, ivyatumye ibintu biyangara mu ntambara y'ubutunzi hagati y'ivyo bihugu vyompi. Hari haciye amasaha make Ubushinwa butangaje integuro y'ukuduza amakori ku bidandazwa biciye  imiliyoni 75 z'amadolari vyinjiye muri ico gihugu bivuye muri vya Amerika, ivyo Perezida Trump yiyamiriza. Bwana Trump avuga ko iyo ngingo y'Ubushinwa ari iya "politike", akabwagiriza ko bushaka "kugendera" kuri Amerika. Ubushinwa bwatangaje integuro y'ukuduza amakori kuva ku bice 5% gushika kuri 10% ku bidandazwa birenga 5000 biva muri Amerika, harimwo ivyimburwa vyo mu burimyi, indege n'ibitoro bitarahingura. Butegura kandi gutoza ikori ryari ryarabangiriweko ry'ibice 25% ku mamodokari ava muri Amerika. Abicishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter ejo ku wa gatanu, Bwana Trump yatangaje iduzwa ry'ayo makori ku bice 5% ku bidandazwa vyinjira bivuye mu Bushinwa. Avuga ko kuva kw'igenekerezo rya 01 ukwezi kw'icumi, Amerika izoduza amakori kuri ivyo bidandazwa biciye imiliyoni 250 y'abanyamerika, kuva kuri 25% gushika kuri 30%. Avuga kandi ko ibidandazwa biciye amadolari 300 vyari vyitezwe gutozwako ikori ingana n'ibice 10% rizoduga gushika kuri 15%. Ati: "Ikibabaje, ni uko ubutegetsi bw'inyuma bwaretse Ubushinwa bukarengera inyungu za Amerika muvyo ubudandaji, ku buryo bwabaye umuzigo ku mutangakori wa Amerika. Jewe nk'umukuru w'igihugu, sinshobora kwemera ko ivyo bisubira". Bwana Trump amenyesha ko "kuri iyo mvo, yategetse" amakompanyi ya Amerika kuvavanura n'Ubushinwa bakarondera abandi bakorana, agapfuma arondera ingene yokorera muri Amerika. Izo ngingo zerekana ukutumvikana hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri ku vyerekeye ubudandaji zatumye ibintu biba nabi ku masoko y'ivunja n'ivunjwa ry'amafarangam haba muri Amerika, canke i Bulaya. Ku munsi wa gatanu, Bwana Trump yarifatiye mu gahanga umukuru w'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu ca Amerika, Jerome Powell, inyuma y'aho avugiye ko iyo ntambara y'ubudandaji ishobora gutuma ubutunzi bwa Amerika bugira ibibazo. Aciye kuri Twitter, Perezida Trump yashitse kure, aho yibajije nimba uyo mukuru w'ibanku nkuru y'igihugu atoba ari "umwansi" mukuru gusumba umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubushinwa, Xi Jinping.

column2: 'Igituririre ni cinshi muri Afrika y'Epfo' - Akanama ka Zondo
column3: Inyuma y'icegeranyo gishira ahagaragara ubusuma bw'ama miriyaridi y'amadolari mu kigega ca reta ya Afrika y'epfo ku ntwaro y'uwamubanjirije, prezida Cyril Ramaphosa yariyemeje ko "ivyo bitazosubira kuba ." Ariko abanye Afrika y'epfo ntibemera ko hari icigwa bakuyemwo. Barababajwe no kuba amahera yibwe yari gukoreshwa mu bisata vy'amagara y'abantu n'uburezi muri ico gihugu. Ayo matohoza akomeye ku giturire co ku ntwaro ya prezida Jacob Zuma yerekanye ingene nk'ibisata vyose vya reta vyanigiwe mu menshi, birononwa n'abategetsi ba ANC  (African National Congress), uri ku butegetsi kuva mu 1994 harangiye intwaro y'abazungu bari ku rushi. Iki cegeranyo cagiriza ahanini uwo mugambwe. Prezida Ramaphosa ubwiwe yabwiwe n'ako kanama karongowe n'umucamanza, ko atakoze ibikwiye mu gukumira ubwo busuma igihe yari icegera ca Zuma. Impapuro zirenga 5.000, akanama Zondo - kiswe izina ry'umucamanza wo mu rwego rwo hejuru akarongoye - karerekana ido n'ido ry'ingene ubutunzi bwa reta bwibwe. Kiranerekana ingene abagwizatunga bavukana bo mu muryango wa Gupta, bagerageje kugira uruhara mu ngingo za politike n'ubutunzi mu ntumbero yiswe  "kwigarurira reta". Zuma yirukanywe ku butegetsi mu 2018 yagirizwa igiturire caguma congerekana, hanyuma Ramaphosa aca afata ubutegetsi yiyemeje guhanagura ivyo vyose. Igice ca nyuma c'ico cegeranyo c'akanama ka Zondo cashikirijwe ku musi wa gatatu. Prezida akaba yavuze ko ivyo babonye ari "iceyi kuri demokrasi yacu kandi vyahonyanze uburenganzira bw'abanye Afrika y'Epfo bose." Ariko bimwe muvyo ico cegeranyo casozerereyeko ni gusigira ibibazo prezida ahari ubu ategerezwa kwishura vyerekeye impamvu vyabaye arorera. Ico cegeranyo kigira kiti: "Hari inkuru nyinshi zifise ifatiro zamenyekanye (...) zashobora kumutuma agira amatohoza akanafata n'ingingo kuri bimwe bivugwa bikomeye. "Nk'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu, yari afise ububasha bwo kubikora." Mu ntango ayo matohoza yategerezwa kuba mu misi 180, ariko ukurengukisha abantu vyatwaye imisi 400 aho ivyabona 300 vyabajijwe. Ico gikorwa cose catwaye imyaka ine. Ivyemezo vyarerekanye ingene abategetsi ba ANC, harimwo abashikiranganji b'ubu n'abakera bagiye canke bafashije mu busuma  vyatumye igihugu gihomba amahera menshi. Muri ivyo harimwo kubuza gukora igisata kijejwe gutoza amakori mu gihugu, gupfukama mu nda ishirahamwe ry'indege South Africa Airways, kwiba amahera mu gisata kijejwe ingendo za gariyamoshi muri ico gihugu no mu kwivanga mu biraba ikinyamakuru ca reta, SABC. Igisata kijejwe iperereza na co nyene caragabanuwe inguvu mu kugena abakozi bo mu rwego rwo hejuru babujije ko haba amatohoza babisabwe na Zuma n'abandi bantu bifatwa ko bamwegereye.

column2: Burundi: Inyuma y'indwi imwe ibitungwa bizosubira kubagwa
column3: Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu n'umutekano bumenyesha ko ibitungwa bigiye gusubira kubagwa kuva ku musi wa gatatu w'indwi iza. Ivyo vyashikirijwe n'umunyamabanga ntayegayezwa Martin Niteretse mu nama yagiranye n'abarongoye intara, abarongoye uturere mu gipolisi hamwe n'abajejwe uburimyi n'ubworozi mu ntara. Ingingo yo guhagarika kubaga ibitungwa yari yafashwe kubera iyaduka ry'ingwara y'inyonko yo mu kiyaya ca Rift (Fièvre de la vallée du Rift) Kugira ivyo bishoboke ngo ibitungwa vyo kubagwa bitegerezwa kwegeranirizwa hamwe. Agira ati:"Abayangayanga  bakeneye kuzobaga mubatunganirize aho begeraniriza ibitungwa bashaka kuzobaga mu ndwi iza. "Nta nka izobagwa itavuye aho muri ico kibanza. Kuko ntayizova mu muhana ica ija kubagwa ubwo nyene." Ivyo bitungwa kugira bije kubagwa, bitegerezwa kumara imisi indwi biri mu kibanza categekanijwe mu makomine yose, bigenzurwa ko bitagwaye. Martin Niteretse kandi avuga ko ata nyama izova mw'ikomine zija mu yindi. Nta n'inka zirekuriwe kuvanwa mu ntara zija mu yindi, kiretse ngo izijanywe kubagirwa mu gisagara c'ubutunzi ca Bujumbura. Ariko ngo nko mu ntara zitagira inka nyinshi, abayangayanga baho barashobora kuja kuzigura ahandi, ariko abategetsi b'aho baziguze bategerezwa kubaha urupapuro ruziherekeza. Kandi ico gihe zizoca ziherekezwa n'igipolisi kugira ntihagire izururukira mu nzira canke izuririra mu nzira  zitagenzuwe neza. Icipfuzo ngo n'uko mu ndwi iza hatangura kubagwa inka, hamwe n'impene n'intamaba 'bishobotse'. Abadandaza basabwe kandi kudaca bikika mu kiza ngo baduze ibiciro. Ku bijanye n'urucanco, Martin Niteretse yabasavye kuja gutegura abajejwe ako kazi kugira incanco zishitse bace baja ku kivi. Haraheze amezi arenga abiri hatanzwe itegeko ko kizira kikaziririza kubaga inka, impene n'intama, mu ntumbero yo gukumira inyono yo mu kiyaya ca Rift.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Lukaku, Pogba, Doku, Abraham, Lingard, Sterling
column3: Sergio Aguero aherutse kugurwa na Barcelona yahinyagaye, ibizomutuma adakina mu kiringo c'indwi cumi (amezi arenga atatu). Mw'itangazo uwo murwi wo muri La Liga wasohoye, Barcelona ivuga ko yahinyagaye mu kuguru kw'iburyo. Aguero w'imyaka 33 yinjiye muri  Barcelona ku masezerano y'imyaka ibiri yateyeko igikumu mu kwa gatandatu, avuye muri Manchester City aho yari amaze imyaka cumi, aho yaciye umuhigo mu bakinyi bamaze kwinjiriza ibitsindo vyinshi uwu murwi, akaba yatsinze ibitsindo 260 mu nkino 390.
