column2: Coronavirus: New York ifise ibitigiri bibini vy’abanduye gusumba ibihugu vyose kw’isi
column3: Intara ya New York muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika muri kino gihe ifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye coronavirus gusumba ibihugu vyose kw'isi uretse ico gihugu. Iyo ntara yamenyesheje ko abamaze kwandura Covid-19 gushika ejo ku wa kane bageze kuri 159.937. Iyo ntara ikaba isumbije ibihugu vyari bizwi ko ari vyo bifise abanduye benshi nka Espanye (153,000 ) hamwe n'Ubutaliyano (143,000). U Bushinwa, aho uwo mugera watanguriye mu mpera z'umwaka uheze, bufise igitigiri ca 82.000 c'abantu bose hamwe banduye. Amerika imaze kugera kuri 462.000 banduye uwo mugera hamwe n'abashika hafi 16.500 bahitanywe nawo. Kw'isi yose, abashika umuliyoni 1.6 nibo bamaze kwandura, nayo 95.000 bakaba bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima. N'aho New York ariyo ifise igitigiri kinini c'abanduye coronavirus kw'isi, ico abamaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera (7000) kiri hasi y'ica Espanye (15.500) n'ico Ubutaliyano (18.000), n'aho gisumba incuro zirenga zibiri ico abahitanywe nawo mu Bushinwa. Hari amasanamu yerekanywe y'abakozi bambaye imyambaro yo kwikingira impanuka bariko barahamba abapfuye mu kinogo kimwe mu gisagara ca New York. Amasanamu yafashwe na za ndege zitagira umudereva, drones, yerekana abakozi bariko bamanuka mu kinogo kirekire bakoresheje ingazi,  aho amasandugu y'ibiziga yariko arashingurwa. Ayo masanamu yafatiwe mu karere kitwa Hart Island, kigeze gukoreshwa n'abategetsi b'ico gisagara imyaka 150 iheze mu guhamba abapfuye batagira ab'iwabo, canke abo mu miryango itari ishoboye kwihambira abayo. Ibikorwa vyo guhamba kuri iryo tongo ry'abapfuye vyariyongereye kubera ico kiza, biva ku munsi umwe mu ndwi bishika ku minsi itanu mu ndwi, nk'uko bimenyeshwa n'igisata kijejwe amabohero. Abapfungwa bo mw'ibohero rya Rikers Island nibo mu bisanzwe bakora ico gikorwa, ariko kubera barengewe, vyabaye ngombwa ko barondera abandi bakozi babikora. Umukuru w'igisagara ca New York, Bill de Blasio yavuze mu ntango z'iyi ndwi ko iryo tongo ry'abapfuye rishobora kwikorwako mu guhamba abahitanywe na kino kiza. Igitigiri c'abahitanwa na coronavirus i New York cariyongereye gushika kuri 799 ku wa gatatu, igitigiri kinini kitari bwahebo ku munsi ugira gatatu. Ariko buramatari w'intara ya NewYork, Andrew Cuomo, yagize icizere kinini inyuma y'aho  igitigiri c'abinjijwe ibitaro kubera covid-19 mu mavuriro ya New York cagabanutse ku ncuro igira kabiri, gushika kuri 200. Avuga ko ivyo vyerekana ko ingingo yo kwirinda kwegerana yazanye akarusho. Avuga ko iki kiza ari "ikibombe kiriko kirakwiragira mu bantu kidacagura, ikibi gisa n'ico twabonye ku wa 11 z'ukw'icenda 2000". Icizere cabonetse kandi ejo ku wa kane aho ibitigiri vyari vyitezwe kurwego rw'igihugu vyagabanutse. Dr Anthony Fauci, umwe mu bategetsi bakomeye bagize umurwi wo kurwanya coronavirus washinzwe n'ibiro vy'umukuru w'iguhugu wa Amerika. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru NBC co muri Amerika ko ibiharuro vyerekana ko Abanyamerika bashobora kuzohitanwa na Covid-19 "bashobora kuba muri 60.000". Mu mpera z'ukwa gatatu, uyo Dr. Fauci yari yavuze ko "abari hagati ya 100.000 na 200.000" aribo baboneka ko bashobora guhitanwa n'uwo mugera. Ico gitigiri ca 60.000 gishobora kungana n'ic'abahitanywe n'indwara y'ibicurane hagati y'ukw'icumi 2019 n'ukwa gatatu 2020 muri Amerika, nk'uko ibiharuro bitangwa n'ubutegetsi bivyerekana. Hagati aho, icegera c'umukuru w'ico gihugu Mike Pence ashimangira ko covid-19 yandukira gusumba indwara y'ibicurane hafi incuro zitatu. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vyarerekanye ubwoba ko abashika imiliyoni 2.2 z'Abanyamerika bashobora guhitanwa na coronavirus mu gihe atacokorwa ngo uwo mugera uhagarare.

column2: Coronavirus: Putin avuga ko urucanco rwemejwe ko rushobora gukoreshwa
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burusiya, Vladimir Putin, avuga ko urucanco rwakorewe muri ico gihugu rwo gukinga Covid-19 rwamaze kwemezwa ko ari nyarwo inyuma y'amezi adashika abiri ruriko rurageragerezwa ku bantu. Perezida Putin avuga ko urwo rucanco rwakorewe umwihwezo wose utegerezwa, yongerako y'uko n'umukobwa wiwe yamaze kuruhabwa. Abategetsi bavuga ko bafise integuro yo gucandaga abanyagihugu mu kivunga kuva mu kwezi kw'icumi. Abahinga berekanye amakenga ku kuntu urwo rukingo rwihutishijwe n'Uburusiya, bakabona ko abashakashatsi bashaka gufata inzira ya hafi. Mu gihe hari ubwoba ku ngaruka zarwo, umuryango witaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, mu ndwi iheze wasavye Uburusiya gukurikiza amategeko mpuzamakungu ku bijanye no gukora urucanco rwa Covid-19. Urwo rucanco rw'Uburusiya ntiruri ku rutonde rw'incanco zitandatu za OMS zemewe kugeragezwa ku rugero rwa gatatu, harimwo no kuzigeragereza ku bantu. Mu gihe avuga ko ari urwa mbere kw'isi, Perezida Putin amenyesha ko uru rucanco rwakozwe n'ikigo Gamaleya c'i Moscou, ari "urukingo nyarwo" rwo kurwanya coronavirus. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Mikhail Murashko, avuga ko uru rucanco "rwerekanye ko rukora neza kandi ko ata ngaruka rufise", akavuga ko ari intambwe ikomeye mu nzira yo gutsinda Covid-19. Urwo rucanco rwiswe Sputnik V,  izina rifatiye ku kigendajuru ca mbere c'igihingurano cabaye kw'isi, rigafatwa n'Uburusiya nk'intsinzi kuko kibaye igihugu ca mbere kwemeza urucanco, nk'uko bivugwa n'umwe mu bategetsi b'iki gihugu asubirwamwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Kirill Dmitriev arongoye ikigega c'Uburusiya, RDIF,  avuga ko iki gihugu kimaze kuronka ibihugu birenga 20 vyamaze gusaba urwo rucanco ku rugero runganga n'umuliyaridi. Mu ndwi iheze, leta y'Uburusiya yatangaje ko yariko irategura gutangura gucandaga abanyagihugu mu kivunga inyuma y'aho imenyeshereje ko yakoze igerageza ry'urwo rucanco. Kw'isi hari incanco zirenga 100 ziriko zirakorwa, zimwe muri zo zikaba ziriko zirageragerezwa ku bantu. N'aho urwo rucanco rwihuse, abahinga nka bose babona ko ata rucanco ruriko ruraboneka kw'isi yose imbere ya 2021 hagati. Kw'igenekerezo rya kane rya kuno kwezi kw'umunani, umuvugizi wa OMS, Christian Lindmeier, yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Rimwe na rimwe abashakashatsi ku giti cabo baravuga ko babonye ikintu, ni vyo ko ico kiba ari ikintu gikomeye". "Ariko ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukuronka urucanco rukora, kandi bibanje guca mu nzira zose zikenewe".

column2: Aung San Suu Kyi: Uwo yatembagajwe ku butegetsi bwa Myanmar yaciriwe iyindi myaka ine yo gupfungwa
column3: Sentare yo muri Myanmar yaciriye Aung San Suu Kyi yakuwe ku butegetsi iyindi myaka ine yo gupfungwa, mu rubanza rwa vuba muri nyinshi zimurindiriye. Yahamijwe icaha co gutunga no kwinjiza mu gihugu  bitemewe n'amategeko amaradiyo yo gutumatumanako (talkie-walkies) hamwe no kurenga ku ngingo za Covid-19. Madame Suu Kyi yagiriwe n'icaha ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa 12, aca acirirwa igihano kigufi  c'imyaka ibiri yo gupfungwa. Asanzwe apfunzwe kuva mu kwezi kwa kabiri igihe igisirikare catembagaza ubutegetsi bwiwe ubu akaba ahanganye n'ibirego vy'ivyaha birenga 10, vyose akaba abihakana. Vyariyamirijwe cane nk'akarenganyo. Vyibazwa ko ivyaha vyo kuri uyu wa mbere vyavuye mu gihe abasirikare basaka inzu yiwe ku munsi haba itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi n'ingabo zari zirongowe na jenerari  Min Aung Hlaing, uwo munsi akaba ariho bavuze ko batoye ivyo ibintu muri iyo nzu. Urubanza rwo kuri uyu wa mbere ku murwa mukuru Nay Pyi Taw nta binyamakuru vyemerewe kurukirira, abacamanza ba Madame Suu Kyi nabo bakaba barabujijwe kuvugana n'abamenyeshamakuru. Ico gihano ca vuba giciye kimushikana  ku myaka itandatu yo gufungwa. Mu kwezi guheze uwo yatsindiye agashimwe k'amahoro ka Nobel yahamijwe  guhamagarira abantu kutumvira ubutegetsi no kurenga ku mategeko ya Covid-19, mu ciyamirijwe n'umukuru w'urwego rwa ONU  rw'agateka ka zina muntu Michelle Bachelet nk'"urubanza rw'akamaramaza". Human Rigjhts Watch  nayo  yavuze ko izo manza ari "ikinamico ya sentare y'imanza zo mu kinyegero ku vyaha vy'irementanya… kugirango (Aung San Suu Kyi) azohere mw'ibohero". Itangazo ry'icegera c'umuyobozi w'iryo shirahamwe muri Asia, Phil Robertson, ryagirije kandi igisirikare "kumuhamya ivyaha muri sentare ijejwe kumuhezayo ku birego bidafashe kandi bishingiye ku mvo za poritike", rivuga ko "cirengagiza uburenganzira bw'abantu bose, kuva kuri Suu Kyi… gushika ku mihari y'abatayoboka ubutegetsi  mu mabarabara." Ifatwa ry'ubutegetsi n'igisirikare muri Myanmar (kizwi kandi nka Birmanie/Burma) mu kwezi kwa kabiri ryabaye haheze  amezi umugambwe wa San Suu Kyi, National League for Democracy (NLD), utsinze urukombamazi amatora yo mu kwezi kwa 11 mu 2020. Igisirikare cavuze  ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma, ariko abakurikirana amatora bavuze ko muri rusangi yagenze neza. Itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi ryakiriwe n'imyiyerekano mu gihugu cose, igisikare ca Myamar kikaba kitihanganiye abitaba iyo myiyerekano basaba demokrasi, abaharanira uburenganzira hamwe n'abamenyeshamakuru. Madame Suu Kyi ni umwe mu bantu barenga 10.600 bafashwe n'igisirikare kuva mu kwezi kwa kabiri, mu gihe abandi barenga 1.303 bishwe mu myiyerekano nk'uko bivugwa n'umugwi ubikurikirana, Assistance Association for Political Prisoners.

column2: Kenya: Abasoromyi b'icayi bajanye urubanza muri sentare ya Scotland
column3: Abakozi indwi bo mu mirima muri Kenya  bitwariye muri sentare yo muri Ecosse (Scotland ) imwe muri kompanyi zikomeye cane kw'isi zimbura icayi  basaba indishi ku mvune batewe n'akazi. Abo basoromyi b'icayi bavuga ko bagize imvune nyinshi  kubera uburyo bakoramwo mu mirima ya James Finlay  Kenya Ltd. Iryo ni ishami rimwe ry'iyo kompanyi ikorera henshi kw'isi ifise amamuko muri Glasgow mu kinjana ca 18. Iyo kompanyi ntiyemera urwo rubanza mu gushigikira ingingo zayo zijanye n'amagara n'umutekano mu kazi. Finlays batanguye bacuruza ipampa muri Ecosse mu 1750 ubu bakaba bafise  ibikorwa mu migabane itanu y'isi, Starbucks ikaba ari umwe mu bakiriya babo. Iyo kompanyi ni nini  cane ku buryo yimbura icayi gikwiye igikenerwa ku mwaka mu Bwongereza bwose. Iyo kompanyi yimuye icicaro cayo gikuru ikivana Glasgow ikijana Londres haraheze imyaka 15 ariko n'ubu yanditswe ko ikorera Aberdeen, ivyo bigatuma imanza irimwo zijanwa muri sentare za Ecosse. Abo bagabo n'abagore indwi bitwaye basaba indishi ingana n'ibihumbi 15 mu mafaranga y'abongereza £15.000, umwe umwe muri sentare ya Sheriff Personal Injury muri Edinburgh. Uwubunganira muri Kenya, Isaac Okero, avuga ko bagize imvune zitandukanye harimwo no mu ruti rw'umugongo. Yabwiye BBC Scotland ati: "Abo bakozi bo mu cayi bavuga ko baravye imyaka bamaze bakorera James Finlay Kenya Ltd, n'uburyo bakoreramwo, bagiye baragira imvune buhoro buhoro gushika aho zigira ingaruka ku buzima bwabo." "Izo mvune zifatiye ku mubiri no mu mutwe." Okero avuga ko bamwe bari bagikora igihe urwo rubanza rwatanguzwa muri ico gisagara kiri ku birometero birenga ibihumbi bitandatu uvuye muri Kenya, ariko ubu umwe wenyene ni we agikora. Abandi barungitswe mu kiruhuko canke naho ntibaba bagishobora gukora. Yibaza ko urwo rubanza ruzogira ingaruko irenze aho. Yavuze ati: "Twizeye ko ruzotuma iyo kompanyi ihindura cane uburyo abakozi bakoreramwo, uru rubanza rero rukazotuma haba akarusho gafadika mu masezerano n'uburyo vy'akazi k'abasoroma icayi, hanyuma harangire ivy'uko hari abakozi b'abanyaKenya bagira invune zibakurikirana ubuzima bwose nk'uko aba bakozi indwi vyabashikiye." Umuhinga mu bijanye n'imvune z'akazi David Short wo mu kigo ca Balfour and Manson co muri Edinburgh ni we  ahagarariye abo basoromyi b'icayi. Yavuze ati: "Mu rubanza rwo muri sentare kimwe mu bintu vya mbere  ubanza kuraba n'aho witura, ni iyihe sentare izotwemerera kwakira urubanza. "Ngaha dufise kompanyi yanditswe muri Ecosse, gutyo rero ikibanza ciza c'urwo rubanza ni muri sentare yo muri Ecosse. "Twitwaye mu rubanza ku bisanzwe  rwobereye muri Kenya. Rwerekana uburyo abakozi babo bakoreramwo n'ubutunzi bwabo." Imyaka ibiri urubanza rumaze gutangura mu 2017, umucamanza yategetse ko Finlays ireka abunganira mu mategeko abo basoromyi bagashika mu mirima yayo muri Kenya, ikabareka bakaraba uburyo abantu bakoreramwo. Finlays yaciye ishingisha urubanza rwo kuvyanka mu masentare yo muri Kenya iranarutsinda ivuga ko ingingo yo muri Ecosse idashobora gushirwa mu ngiro kiretse ibanje kwemerwa na sentare yo muri Kenya. Abasoromyi b'icayi barunguruje kuri iyo ngingo, uruzocibwa rukaba rwitezwe gusohoka mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Short avuga ati: "Bitwaza ngo ntivyemewe mw'ibwirizwanshingiro. "Naho vyoba biri uko, ni kuki batatureka ngo tuje kuraba? Ndakeka ko ari uko badashaka ko tubona uburyo buteye ubwoba abo bantu bakoreramwo." Mu kwezi kwa kabiri, abo basoromyi b'icayi barerekanye uburyo abakozi bo mu yindi kompanyi yo muri Kenya bakoreramwo, abunganizi babo bo mu Bwongereza barabiraba. Gwen Morgan-Evans, wo mw'ishirahamwe ry'abashingwamanza Hugh James, avuga ati: "Twaragiye muri Kenya turi kumwe na babiri mu bahinga bo mu Bwongereza kugira barabe ingene icayi gisoromwa kugira bagire inama sentare yo muri Ecosse y'ingene ubwo buryo bwo gukora buhungabanya amagara. "Ico kibazo gishika kure. Hamwe urwo rubanza borutsinda, abarushingishije bizigiye ko vyozana akarusho ku bakora mu cayi muri Kenya." Ikinyamateka ca vuba ca Finlays 1750 cashimikiye ku bikorwa vyayo muri Kenya. Umukuru w'iyo kompanyi Guy Chambers yakibwiye ati: ''Turemera ko vyose bitera ngo de kandi ko hama hari ivyo gukora neza gusumba. "Ariko abatunegura rimwe na rimwe barirengagiza urugero rw'utwigoro twagize mu gufasha ab'aho dukorera." Mw'itangazo umuvugizi yagize ati: ''James Finlays [Kenya] Ltd  yiyemeje kwiregura ku birego vyose vyashikirijwe haba muri sentare nkuru ya Nairobi canke iya All Sheriff Personal Injury." Iyo kompanyi ivuga ko ibikorwa vyayo vyo kurima no guhingura icayi muri Kericho na Bomet birimwo abakozi ibihumbi 8 n'ubundi buzi bushamikiye ku cayi vyose ''bitanga inyungu ifadika muri ako karere". Iryo tangazo rirabandanya riti: "Twama turondera gushika ku rugero rwo hejuru rwo kwitaho amagara, umutekano n'ineza y'abantu bose dukorana. "Dufise ingingo twashizeho kuva kera zijanye n'amagara n'umutekano aho hose dufise ibikorwa kw'isi, harimwo no muri Kenya." Mu myaka ya 1980, imyiyerekano yarabaye hanze y'ahariko harabera inama rusangi ya buri mwaka ya Finlays i Glasgow ku buryo bwo gukoramwo mu mirima yayo y'icayi mu Buhindi. Umwe mu bari mu myiyerekano mu 1984 yari Roger Jeffery, ubu akaba ari umwigisha muri Kaminuza ya Edinburgh mu gisata c'ivyigwa vya poritike. Yavuze ati: "Uwurongoye iyo kompanyi ico gihe yavuze ko turi abantu bahiga isoko hose, tuja ahantu hose turondera kuronka inyungu ku banyamitahe bacu kandi avuga ata kivyerekana na kimwe ashize ahabona ko ari abakoresha beza kandi ko abantu baronkera akarusho mu bikorwa vyabo." Agira ico avuze ko urwo rubanza rw'ubu, Prof Jeffrey yavuze ati: "Uvyihweje neza muri rusangi, wokwemera ko kurima icayi ari igikorwa kibangamye,  kandi ntibashobora gutangura guha abakozi babo imishahara nk'iyitangwa i Buraya, ariko nemera ko bashobora gusumvya  uko biri ubu."

column2: Gukingira ibikorwa mva-bwenge mu Burundi bigeze hehe?
column3: Itariki 26 ukwezi kwa kane ni umunsi ngaruka-mwaka uzwi nka World Intellectual Property Day, canke umunsi wo kuzirikana "ibikorwa mva-bwenge". Ni umunsi ushishikariza inyungu ziva ku bikorwa bishingiye ku bwenge  birimo ubugeni, ubuvanganzo, ubusizi, birimo na muzika. Akarorero ni  mu Burundi, aho kiretse kugira amategeko, banafise ikigo cashinzwe na leta, OBDA (Office Burundais des droits d'auteurs) co gufasha gutoza utwo turusho. column2: Vatican: Kardinali Becciu yategetswe gutanga imihoho, ibitari bimenyerewe
column3: Umukardinali yari mu bari bafise amabanga akomeye i Vaticano kwa Papa, Giovanni Angelo Becciu, yatanze imihoho giturumbuka ariko akavuga ko yategetswe na Papa Francis. Avuga ko yiketswe gukoresha umutungo wa Ekleziya yihera benewabo, agahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Kardinali Becciu yari umwe mu begereye cane Papa, akaba yarigeze kuba ajejwe amabanga mu bunyamabanga bwa leta ya Vaticano. Yagiye kugira uruhara mu masezerano yateye impari yo gushora imitahe mu nyubakwa nziza ya Londres mu mafaranga ya Ekleziya. Iki gikorwa kuva ico gihe kiriko kirakorwako amatohoza. Ntibikunze kuboneka aho abantu bo ku rwego rwo hejuru i Vaticano batanga imihoho, kandi na Vaticano nta vyinshi yabivuzeko mw'itangazo ryasohowe ku wa kane. Ariko uyu mu kardinali w'imyaka 72 yabwiye ikinyamakuru co ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi Domani co mu Butaliyano ko yategetswe gutanga imihoho kuko yiketswe ko yahaye benewabo amafaranga ya Ekleziya. Avuga ati: "Nta n'urufaranga na rumwe jewe nigeze niba. Nta matohoza ndiko ndakorwako, ariko ari nka hamwe bonshira imbere y'ubutungane, nokwisigura". Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru yagiye gushikiriza mu nyuma, uyu mukardinali avuga ko ibogozwa ryiwe ryabaye giturumbuka. Avuga ko na Papa "atari agononokewe" igihe yatangaza iyi nkuru. Ati: "Ni ibisigabwenge. Gushika ejo…niyumvira ko nari umugenzi pfa mpfe wa Papa, intumwa yiwe y'umwizigirwa". "Mu nyumn rero niho Papa yambwira ko atakinyizeye kuko yaronse amakuru yahawe n'abacamanza bamubwira ko nakoze icaha co kunyuruza umutungo". Kardinali Becciu ashimangira ko habaye "ukutumvikana", akongera kandi ati: "Nditeguye gusigurira Papa vyose. Nta caha na kimwe nakoze". Uyu mukardinali Giovanni Angelo Becciu ni umutaliyano yamaze imyaka ya mbere akora mu gisata kijejwe imigenderanire i Vaticano. Papa Francis niwe yamugize umukardinali mu 2018, igihe aherewe amabanga mashasha yo kurongora igisata kijejwe ibijanye n'ubweranda. Yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano avuga ati: "Ni uruhombo kuri jewe, umuryango wanje, abanyagihugu b'igihugu canje. Navyemeye ku bugamburutsi n'urukundo mfitiye Ekleziya na Papa". N'aho mu vyo yagirijwe harimwo ibijanye n'amasezerano ajanye n'inyubakwa ya Londres ivugwa ko yaguzwe mu mutungo wa Ekleziya, Kardinali Becciu wewe siko abibona. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ejo ku wa gatanu, uyu mukardinali yavuze ko Papa yamwagirije ko yakoresheje nabi umutungo wa Ekleziya akawushira mu ma koperative n'urucuruza vya benewabo. Ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano kandi bivuga ko Papa atanezerejwe n'ingene imperezwa yo gufashisha abakene yiswe Peter's Pence yagiye gukoreshwa mu bindi bitari biyigenewe. Kardinali Becciu azobandanya afise iki giti n'aho yatanze imihoho. Hagati aho, nta ruhara azogira mu gutora uwundi mu Papa.

column2: Pierre Buyoya yahoze arongoye Uburundi yashinguwe uyu musi i Bamako muri Mali
column3: Pierre Buyoya yarongoye Uburundi incuro zibiri akaba aheruka gushengera ku myaka 71 uyu munsi yashinguwe ku mugwa mukuru wa Mali, Bamako, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibimenyeshamakuru vyo muri iki gihugu. Imisa yo kumusezera muri Grande Cathedrale de Bamako, yitabiriwe n'abo mu muryango wiwe, intumwa zaserukiye leta ya Mali, n'izaserukiye Ubumwe bw'Afrika eka n'abahagarariye ibihugu vyabo muri Mali. Nta baserukiye reta y'Uburundi barungitswe mu birori vyo kumushingura nk'uko ibinyamakuru byo muri Mali bibivuga. Reta y'i Gitega ntiraba ryiza uyu muhisi. Hanyuma yashinguwe mw'itongo ry'abapfuye rya Ekleziya Gatolika i Bamako. Buyoya yatwaye Uburundi mu 1987 - 1993 na 1996 - 2003 hose afashe ubutegetsi ku nguvu, intwaro yiwe ikaba itavugwako rumwe. Mu 1993 yatsinzwe mu matora n'umuhisi Perezida Melchior Ndadaye, yemeye aho intahe ishize atanga ubutegetsi mu mahoro. Mu kwezi kwa 10 uyu mwaka yakatiwe umunyororo wo guherayo na sentare mu Burundi, yagirizwa uruhara mw'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye mu 1993. We yahakana ivyo yagirijwe akavuga ko urwo ari urubanza rufise imvo za politike. Mu kwezi guheze yavuze ko 'yatanze imihoho kugira aronke umwanya wo kweza izina ryiwe'. Haciye indwi zirenga gatoya zibiri Buyoya yarashengeye giturumbuka, umuntu umwe wo muryango wiwe yabwiye BBC ko yahitanywe na Covid-19 kandi ko yaguye i Paris mu Bufaransa. Hari ababona Buyoya nk'uwahisemwo inzira y'amahoro ku Burundi, akemera amasezerano ya Arusha akarekura ubutegetsi ku neza mu 2003. Hanyuma y'ibi akagirwa intumwa idasanzwe y'Ubumwe bwa Afrika mu bikorwa vyo kugarukana amahoro muri Sahel. Uyu munsi, i Bujumbura naho nyene habaye imisa yo kumusezera.

column2: Jose Mourinho muri Tottenham: Uwusubiriye Mauricio Pochettino yoba ari we abereye?
column3: Jose Mourinho ari mu mayira atamenyereye mu gihe atanguye akazi ko kumenyereza Tottenham Hotspur nyuma y'iyirukanwa rya Mauricio Pochettino. Kuja kwa Mourinho mu kipe nshasha mu bisanzwe bizana icizere kuko ni umuntu yama azana ibikombe, kandi Spurs vyarayankiye kuva yatwara igikombe ca League Cup mu 2008. Ariko ubu hoho siko biri. Ubu asubiriye umumenyereza yari akunzwe cane kandi iyirukanwa ryiwe rikaba ryashavuje abakunzi benshi ba Tottenham, baciye mbere bongera ishavu mu kubaza niba koko uyu munye Portugal abereye gusimbura Pochettino. None Mourinho ni we muntu abereye Spurs? Umuyobozi mukuru wa Tottenham Daniel Levy yakoze ibiri mu vyifuzo vyiwe mu guha akazi Mourinho, uyu nawe akaba yaratangaje ko yigeze gusabwa kuza muri Spurs mu 2007. Ico gihe yavuze ko umuyobozi w'iyo kipe yagerageje no kwemera kuriha indishi zijanye n'amasezerano yari afise y'uko avuye muri Chelsea mu 2006, yari kumara imyaka ibiri adakora muri Premier League. Birakunze aronse umuntu yarondera ariko azobona y'uko - nk'uko vyagendeye abandi - mu gihe Mourinho ashobora kuzana ibikombe banyotewe, ni umuntu kandi azimvye, atwarira hejuru kandi ukugenda kwiwe kwama kuzana amarira. Amarira menshi. Canke hoho Mourinho azovyifatamwo gute mu gihe bizwi ko Levy adapfa kurekura ifaranga? Ni ikintu camye giteza uruhagarara na Pochettino, yakora afise uburyo bukeyi cane ugereranije n'amenyereza bakeba biwe. Spurs nta mukinyi yigeze igura mu masoko abiri y'abakinyi akurikirana, kandi uyu munye Argentine yari yashikirije ko mu ntango z'iri higanwa inyito yiwe yohinduka ntibe umuyobozi ahubwo ikaba umumenyereza mukuru, vyerekana ko ata jambo rinini yari afise hanze y'umukino. Mourinho ntazimbutse guhemba. Kandi ntakoresha abakinyi bagura make. Tottenham yishimiye cane ishure ryayo ry'umupira w'amaguru kandi ikabona abakinyi nka Harri Winks akina hagati nk'ikimenyetso ca kazoza; Mourinho wewe asa nk'uko atanezwe no kubaho kw'ishure ry'umupira. Biragoye kubona ukuntu Levy yorekura amahera imiriyoni £89 kuri Paul Pogba, £75 kuri Romely Lukaku, canke £52 kuri Fred, nk'uko Ed Woodward yabikoze muri Manchester United. Igihe nashikiriza izina Mourinho ku kipe imwe ejo bundi, inyishu baciye bampa ni iyi: "Yoshaka imiriyoni £250 zo kugura abakinyi bashasha imbere y'uko twicara ku meza tukaganira." Spurs na Levy si uko bakora - canke tuvuge ko atariko bakoranye na Pochettino. Nyuma yo gushika muri Southampton mu kwa gatanu 2014, yakoresheje amahera imiriyoni £394 ku bakinyi, ariko agaruza miriyoni £295. Pochettino yari yiteguriye gukora, n'imiburiburi mu gihe c'umwanya muto, mu buryo yahawe kuko yashoboye gushikana ikipe muri zine za mbere inshuro zine yikurikiranya muri Premier League anashikana iyo kipe ku nshuro ya mbere mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Champions League. Ariko Levy arashobora gukebera Mourinho kanini kurusha Pochettino. Iyi kipe ya Tottenham ni kipe ikeneye cane guhindura kandi uyu mumenyereza mushasha akorana gusa n'abakinyi babushitse, kandi bazimvye. Baca umugani ngo ubukwe bwiza bukenera ko impande zose zakira ariko kandi zigatanga. Mu vyerekeye kugura abakinyi, Mourinho yamye ashaka ko ba nyene ikipe batanga nawe akakira - mu gihe, muri ubwo buryo, Levy yamye yiyubara gutanga. Umuyobozi mukuru wa Tottenham arashobora kuba ari mu mwuka wo gutanga ka natsinda yamye ashaka Mourinho, ariko bitwara kwiyumvira cane kugira wemere ko uku gukorana kuzoshoboka hagati y'aba babiri kuko basanzwe ari abantu badatamikwa ijambo. Icivugo ca Tottenham ni iki: "Kwubahuka ni ugukora." Vyanditse hose ku kibuga cabo gishasha ciza cane catwaye umuriyaridi umwe w'amadolari. Mourinho si umunyereza yubahuka, kandi ico ni ikintu gisanzwe kiraje ishinga abafana ba Spurs - naho yavyitwayemwo neza mu gutwara Premier League gatatu, hamwe n'ibikombe nk'ivyo mu bindi bihugu bitatu, co kimwe na Champions League. Ibibonwa nko kunanirwa muri Manchester United birimwo ibigombe vya Carabao Cup hamwe na Europa League mu mwaka wiwe wa mbere. Ubu hari ubudasa. Niko, abafana benshi ba Spurs bari batewe impungenge n'umukenyuro wa Pochettino hamwe n'uko ikipe yari ihagaze, ariko uwo mugabo w'imyaka 47 aracakunzwe cane kubera ivyo yashitseko. Kuza kwa Mourinho ntikwakirijwe gusa amakenga mu bafana benshi, ariko kandi hari n'abavyiyamirije kubera ibintu bibiri. Asubiriye umumenyereza yari umuhuza ku bafana benshi ba Spurs. Mourinho arahangana kandi ntahurizweko. Akeneye kandi kwerekana ko atari umuntu yaheze, umuntu yasizwe n'ibihe ugereranije na Pep Guardiola na Jurgen Klopp. Pochettino yari yegeranye cane n'abafana ba Spurs, bamukundiye uko ameze n'uko yifata. Mourinho ntanezwe no gukundwa canke ibishobisho - intsinzi niyo nyamukuru. Nta kinya agira kandi akora ibifatika - ibi rero bica bidushikana ku mukenyuro wiwe mu gukina. Abafana ba Tottenham bamenyereye umupira unyaruka, ufise umurindi, urimwo gusatira nk'uko Pochettino yakinisha abakinyi. Bahora bakina umupira ubereye ijisho nk'uko bavyerekanye mu makipe akomeye i Buraya. Umukenyuro wa Mourinho usa n'uwanditswe mw'ibuye kandi, ibi ni ivya nkenerwa, vyaramuhiriye - ariko ibi bihushanye na Pochettino. Gukomera, gutegura neza, akazi kakarangu bihagije. Abafana ba Spurs barashobora kwemera ibigiye kuza - ariko none bizomara igihe kingana gute?

column2: Kardinali Burke anegura Papa Francis ku vyo aherutse gushikiriza ku bubakana basangiye ibitsina
column3: Umwe mu bategetsi bakomeye ba Ekleziya Gatolika aranegura amajambo Papa Francis aherutse gushikiriza ku vyerekeye abakundanye basangiye igitsina, akavuga ko ari ivyiyumviro vyiwe bwite bidashobora gukurikizwa n'Abagatolika. Kardinali Raymond Burke abonwa na benshi ko atava kw'izima ku mico ya Ekleziya Gatolika yavuze ibi mw'ijambo yashikirije haciye umunsi umwe Papa yerekanywe ariko ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokwemerwa n'amategeko. Yari amajambo atari bwaje ku mugaragaro. Ku wa gatatu w'ino ndwi, niho Papa Francis yumvikanye ashikiriza ayo majambo. Bivanye n'aho umuntu ahagaze muri Ekleziya, Kardinali Burke ni ihwa kuri Papa, canke naho umwe muri bake bazovugisha ukuri ku butegetsi. Kurwanya Papa ku bijanye no gushigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bemerwa imbere y'amategeko ni ibintu bidatangaje, ariko amajambo yabivuzemwo niyo kumbure yotangaza. Mu gihe Raymond Burke avuga ko amajambo ya Papa Francis ari "iciyumviro ciwe bwite", yongera ko y'uko abagatolika badategetswe kwumvira uyu mukuru wa Ekleziya kuri iki kibazo, ariko ko abayobozi ba Ekleziya basanzwe bafise igikorwa co gukora ico yise 'gutanga umuco ukenewe'. Arongera agashimangira y'uko ibikorwa vy'abahuje ibitsina babisangiye 'biteye kubiri n'imico' ishingiye ku kwemera kwa Gatolika, akavuga ko amajambo yavuzwe na Papa adahuye n'inyigisho za Ekleziya kandi ko ziteye umubabaro. Mw'ireresi ivuga ku buzima n'ibikorwa vyiwe, Papa Francis yumvikanye ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bakwiye kwemerwa imbere y'amategeko. Ati: "Ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kugira umuryango. Nta n'umwe akwiye gutabwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico. "Ico tugomba gushiraho ni itegeko ribaha uburenganzira bwo kubana. Gutyo bakaba bakingiwe n'amategeko". Mu nyigisho za Gatolika, imibonano mpuzabitsina hagati y'abasangiye igitsina ifatwa 'nk'ukugoka'. Aya majambo yavuzwe na Papa yateye impari, aho hari bamwe bashigikiye ivyo yavuze, abandi nabo babirwanya cane. Gusa impungenge zibandanya zibonekeza ni ingaruka aya majambo ashobora kugira ufatiye aho Ekleziya Gatolika ihagaze kuri iki kibazo. Massimo Faggioli, umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye n'ivy'Imana akaba n'umwanditsi w'igitabo Pope Francis: Tradition, yabwiye BBC ati: "Nta gushidikanya ko ivyo Francis yavuze ari ikintu gishasha muri Ekleziya. Hagati aho, ni ikibazo yagiye agarukako cane kuva muri ino myaka mike iheze".

column2: Ntahokatarondererwa: Josiane Kwizera yahisemwo gufotora, abavyeyi bashaka ko yiga kuvura
column3: Uwo mwigeme w'imyaka 27 yahejeje amashure yisumbuye mu gisata c'ubumenyi (scientifique), abavyeyi biwe bipfuza ko abandanya mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu ariko we ahitamwo kwiyigisha gufotora. Avuga ko yakunze umwuga wo gufotora kuva akiri umwana. Ati: "Kuva nkiri umwana narakunda gufotora. Narakina ibintu vyo gufotora nkoresheje telefone canke ibindi bikoresho". Josiane avuga ko ahejeje amashure yisumbuye yinginze abantu benshi ngo bamwigishe uwo mwuga ariko benshi baramwankira. Umwe gusa ni we yamwemereye mu 2018. Josiane Kwizera avuga ko yatanguye kubikora nk'umwuga mu 2019, n'aho abavyeyi biwe bo bipfuza ko yokora umwuga wo kuvura abantu. Agira ati: "Abavyeyi bashaka ko mbandanya kwiga ivyo kuvura, ariko jewe nahisemwo gufotora kuko ari vyo nkunda. "Ubu ndaronka amasoko yo gufotora abana, mu manza z'isabukuru n'iz'ubugeni. "Ndaniyigisha nkoresheje inyabwonko kandi maze kumenya vyinshi." Kwizera avuga ko ubu, afashijwe n'uwo mwuga wo gufotora, hari vyinshi atakizera ku bavyeyi. Agira ati: "Ubu ndirihira inzu nkoreramwo, nariguriye camera-foto yo mu bwoko bwa Canon izimvye cane, ndagura akamoto n'inyabwonko. "Ndafasha n'abavukanyi banje nanje nkifasha ntarinze kugora abavyeyi." Josiane Kwizera ahanura urwaruka gukura amaboko mu mpuzu ngo bironderere akazi. Ati: "Ubu si nka kera aho abavyeyi bacu baheza ishure basanga akazi kabarindiriye, akazi n'ukukarondera. "Ugaye akazi, ntuba uzi ico ushaka gukora."

column2: Germany: Igarariza rya Katolika mu guhezagira ababana basangiye igitsina, n'abagore basoma misa
column3: Ng'izo inkengeri ziravuze, inanga ziratangura gusamirana, maze Patiri Jan Korditschke na we araduga kuri Arutari kugira ahereze inkuka y'imisa. Vyose bisa nk'uko vyahora bimeze iyo hageze imisa ku wa Mungu muri Katolika. Ariko muri ako kanya nyene, hari ikintu kidasanzwe kiri mu mitima ya bamwe kandi kibateye impungenge. Ikintu kigomba kibe ni ikidasanzwe na gato. Patiri Korditschke arafashe ijambo, ati "uwo wese yipfuza umuhezagiro w'Imana ni ahaguruke". Hafi abari mw'isengero bose barahaguruka, harimwo n'abatari bake basanzwe bubakanye basangiye ibitsina. Ng'ako akaririmbo karatanguye, patiri na we aregera, maze abaza umwe umwe ico yipfuza gusaba Imana mu bisabisho vyabo. Hanyuma niko kuganzura ibiganza yubika ku mitwe yabo asengera umwe umwe. Hari benshi bakoroye amosozi. Aba rero si abandi, ni ba bandi bubakanye basangiye ibitsina, inyuma y'imyaka itari mike nibwo bwa mbere bakiriwe ukuri kwamye muri Ekleziya. Umwe muri bo Sangha, umukatolika kuva avuka ari kumwe n'uwo bubakanye, Frieda kuva imyaka 25 yose, ati: "Ni ibintu bibabaje cane kandi ubu niho mbonye ingene nakomerekejwe ku mutima". "Mu myaka 49 yose, sinigeze nakirwa. Ariko rero impera n'imperuka, abantu baratanguye kuvuga bati: 'kuba uri ng'aha nta ngorane'". Ku bwa Matthias, na we nyene yavutse ari umukatolika akaba yaronse uwo muhezagiro ari kumwe n'uwo bubakanye Thomas, kuja mu misa ntiyigeze iba ingorane. Ariko avuga ko amajambo ashikirizwa n'abategetsi ba Katolika yamutumye yiyumvira guhindura idini. Ati: "Igihe cose namye nibaza nimba ari ngombwa ko nguma mw'idini ritanyemera. Ariko rero, Ekleziya 'nyayo' hano ku rubuga, irongeye kugarura ukwemera kwanje". Mu buryo bw'agahemo, ijambo nk'iri rishikirizwa n'abategetsi ni ryo ryatumye iyi misa igenda uko yagenze. Mu kwa gatatu, Vaticano yasohoye itangazo rikomeye rivuga ko ukwubakana hagati y'abasangiye igitsina ari "icaha", rinashimangira ko abapatiri bose bazohirahira bagahezagira abubakana basangiye igitsina bashirwa ku ruhande. Iki ni ikintu abapatiri bo nyene ku giti cabo bakora - ariko ni gake biba ku mugaragaro. Iri jambo rikarishe rya Vaticano ryashavuje abakatolika bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka mu Budagi. Mu kwishura, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abapatiri, ababikira n'abakirisu baciye batanguza isekeza bise Liebe gewinnt (Urukundo Ruratsinda/l'Amour Triomphe/Love Wins), kugira bemeze ku mugaragaro ko ababana basangiye ibitsina bemewe mu masengero yabo. Patiri Korditschke ati: "Narashavuye numva n'isoni kubera nibaza ko ari ijambo ribabaje cane". Ni umwe mu bapatiri hafi  120 bo mu Budagi bafashe ingingo yo kugarariza ku mugaragaro iri tegeko rya Vaticano. Mu kiringo c'indwi imwe gusa abapatiri baremesheje ibisabisho mu masengero ya Katolika mu gihugu cose c'Ubudagi bahezagira abantu abo ari bo bose babisavye, harimwo n'abubakanye mu buryo Vaticano ibona ko ari icaha, nk'abubakanye n'abahukanye, hamwe n'abubakanye basangiye igitsina. Umunyamakuru wa BBC abajije Patiri Korditschke ingene asigura igituma aja kubiri n'itegeko rya Vaticano, yishuye akorora amosozi. Guhezagira abubakanye basangiye ibitsina biri mu bintu bigenda vyiyongera mu bakatolika bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka mu Budagi. Amashirahamwe aharanira agateka k'abagore, nka Maria 2.0, nayo nyene asaba uburenganzira bungana muri Ekleziya. Haciye umusi umwe inyuma y'iki gisabisho ca Patiri Korditschke i Berlin, abagore baragiye ku ruhimbi basigura ijambo ry'Imana mu masengero ya Katolika 12 atandukanye y'Ubudagi - na vyo nyene Vaticano ikaba itavyemera. Ulrike Göken-Huismann umugore yashikirije ijambo mw'isengero asengeramwo mu karere ka Düsseldorf, avuga ati: "Ekleziya yahora itwigisha ko Isi iringaniye kandi yatwigisha ko twategerezwa kuvyemera uko. Ariko rero vyabaye ngombwa ko Ekleziya ihindura. Canke kandi wibuke ko wategerezwa kwemwera ko Adamu na Eva ari abantu babayeho. Ntibivuga y'uko Ekleziya idategerezwa guhindura ivyo yigisha". Abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika mu Budagi ntibahuza: hari uruhande rumwe rw'abasenyeri  rushigikiye ko ibintu bihinduka, mu gihe urundi ruhande rw'abarongoye Ekleziya ruryumako, rukaba rushigikiye intumbero ya Vaticano itarota iva kw'izima . Hagati aho, ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko hari abakatolika ku giti cabo mu Budagi bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka. Icigwa kimwe cakozwe n'amashure kaminuza yo mu bisagara vya Berlin na Münster cerekana ko ibice 70% vy'abakatolika mu Budagi bashigikiye ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bahezagirwa, 80% nabo bakaba ata ngorane babona ku bantu babanye batarahezagirwa, hanyuma 85% nabo bakaba babona ko abapatiri nabo bokwemererwa kurongora. Inyuma y'igisabisho co guhezagira abubakanye basangiye igitsina i Berlin, abantu baharurwa mw'ijana baciye bakoranira hamwe hanze y'isengero biha agacupa mu buryo bwo kwigina kuri iyo ntambwe. Ariko kw'irembo ry'isengero, abantu bashika cumi bakoze imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyi ngendo, bafise icapa canditseko ngo "Imana ntihezagira icaha". Nta mishamirano iri hagati y'izi mpande ariko zompi zigizwe n'abantu bakomeye muri Ekleziya Katolika badahuriza hamwe. Amwenyura, Patiri Korditschke  wewe yivugira ati "ivyo na vyo ni sawa." Papa avuga iki ku bijanye n'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye? Mu kw'icumi 2020: Papa Francis yabwiye umuhinga akora amareresi ko abashaka kwubakana basangiye ibitsina "bokwemererwa imbere y'amategeko".  "Abahuza ibitsina babisangiye ... ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu muryango. Nta n'umwe yokwirukanwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico". Mu kw'icumi  2014: Ikoraniro ry'abasenyeri b'Ekleziya (synod) bahakanye ivyipfuzo vyari bishigikiwe na Papa ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye bokwemerwa. Mu kw'indwi  2013: Ari mu ndege ari ku rugendo, Papa yabwiye abanyamakuru ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye batokumirwa ahubwo ko boshirwa mu muryango. Yavuze ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye basanzwe bari mu barongoye Ekleziya bogirirwa imbabazi, ivyaha vyabo bigaharirwa. 2013:Mu gitabo On Heaven and Earth (Ku vyerekeye Ijuru n'Isi), Papa avuga ko gufata ku rugero rumwe abahuza  ibitsina babisangiye n'abubakana badasangiye ibitsina kwoba "ari ugusubira inyuma nk'ibirenge". 2010: Igihe yari musenyeri mukuru wa Buenos Aires yariyamiriza ko amategeko yemerera abashaka kwubakana basangiye ibitsina ariko agashigikira ko abasanzwe bubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokingirwa n'amategeko ku rugero kanaka.

column2: Rwanda - Burundi: "Ivyo twasavye Urwanda ntirurabishitsa" - Alain Guillaume Bunyoni
column3: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Uburundi  Alain Guillaume Bunyoni  yavuze ko imigederanire n'igihugu c'Urwanda itaraba myiza inyuma yo gutosekera kuva mu 2015. Yabivuze yishura ibibazo vy'abamenyeshamakuru mu kiganiro yatanze ahejeje kuraba aho  abashikiranganji biwe bagejeje gushira mu ngiro imigambi ya reta. Alain Guillaume Bunyoni avuga ko iyo migenderanire "itaragenda neza kuko ivyo twasavye Urwanda n'ubu ntirurabishitsa." Mu kwezi kw'indwi, umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko ari "igitangaro" kubona Urwanda rwarungitse umushikiranganji warwo wa mbere Edouard Ngirente kuruhagarira mu birori vyo guhimbaza imyaka 59  Uburundi buronse intahe yo kwikukira. Alain Guillaume Bonyoni yagarutse ku vyo Uburundi bwamye bwagiriza Urwanda kuva mu 2015 harimwo: . Alain Guillaume Bunyoni yavuze ko abari bateguye  gutembagaza  ubutegetsi "guhera kuri General Godefroid Niyombare bashikiye mu Rwanda bakirwa nk'abami, ivyo birazwi". "Ntaco bokora harya mu Rwanda ngo bavuge  ngo twebwe abarundi ntitwokimenya kuko dufiseyo incuti, tuvuga ururimi rumwe, ivyo rero ni ibintu bisanzwe bigaragara." Ivyo Urwanda rwagirizwa n'Uburundi rwagumye rubihakana, ahubwo narwo rukagiriza Uburundi ko abarurwanya bo mu muharui witwaje ibigwanisho wa FLN batera bava mu Burundi aho bafise ibirindiro. Haheze igihe hari intambwe zo kunagura imigenderanire ziterwa hagati y'Uburundi n'Urwanda. Kimwe mu vyabaye nk'ikimenyetso gikomeye ni urugendo rw'umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Urwanda i Bujumbura. Edouard Ngirente niwe yahagarariye igihugu ciwe mu birori vy'imyaka 59 Uburundi bwari bumaze buronse intahe yo kwikukuira itariki ya mbere ukwezi kw'indwi. Mu vyo reta y'Uburundi isaba Urwanda harimwo kubushikiriza abo buvuga ko ruhaye indaro kandi baronderwa n'Ubutungane ku vyaha boba bahunze bahejeje gukora. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Uburundi Alain Guillaume Bunyoni yavuze ko atari "gupfa kuvuga ngo imigenderanire igende neza icari  catumye itosekera kitaratora umuti".

column2: Abakunzi ba Real Madrid basaba ko Zinedine Zidane yirukanwa
column3: Real Madrid yatsinzwe yari yakoresheje uburyo bwose bukenewe, ku bakinyi n'amahera, mu nkino za Champions League zo mur'iri ci. Iri shavu ryavuye kw'itsinda rya Paris St-Germain 3 - 0. Uru rukino rwahurije iyi mirwi ibiri mu Bufaransa, ku wa 18 z'ukw'ukw'icenda, mu mahiganwa ya Champions League. Bubaye ubwa mbere mu nkino zishika 578 zo mur'urwo rwego, uyu murwi rutura wo muri Espagne, utsindwa ku busa nk'uko. Kur'ayo makuru y'ikinyamakuru 'The Sun', Zinedine Zidane yemeye ko barushijwe ati: "Nta gihishwa kirimwo baturushije, naho mu minota 15 ya mbere ari twebwe twayobora urukino". Yerekana akababaro, Zidane yongeye ati: "Biragoye gusigura ingene vyatunaniye kwigarura, urukino rwose rugahera". Ivyo adatahura, ni navyo vyashavuje abakunzi b'umurwi wiwe, kuko ubusatirizi bwari bwakomejwe. Abazwi basatira ni nka Gareth Bale, Eden Hazard na Karim Benzema. Mur'izi nkino zo muci, Real Madrid yaziteguriye ku giciro c'amahera y'Abongereza imiliyoni 500. Ku mbuga ngurukana bumenyi, inyandiko za bamwe zemeza ko Zinedine Zidane yagarukanywe nk'umumenyereza wa Real de Madrid, kuko Florentino Perez - umuyobozi w'uwo murwi- vyamunaniye kumwirukana burundu.

column2: Gufungura neza: Imfungurwa ntungamagara 90% y'abantu batarya bihagije
column3: Nk'ubu nobereka imfungurwa z'akamaro kadasanzwe zishobora kubatuma muramba mwumva mworyoherwa? Mu bisanzwe, izi ni imfungurwa zigabanya ivyago vyo gufatwa n'indwara z'umutima (crises cardiaques), isanganya ry'ubwonko (AVC) hamwe n'izindi ndwara zidakira, nk'igisukari co ku rugero rwa kabiri. Izi mfungurwa ni izibatuma mwirinda umuvyibuho urenze urugero, umuvuduko udasanzwe w'amaraso, zikabafasha kandi kugabanya vya binure bizwi nka cholestérol. Izi mfungurwa zirasanzwe kandi ntizizimvye, mbere biroroshe no kuzironka mu masoko n'amazu adandarizwamwo imfungurwa. Zizwi nka fibres - si ikintu gihambaye cane kw'isi, ariko icigwa gikomeye cerekana urugero nkenerwa rwa fibres dutegerezwa gufungura, kikerekana kandi ko hari akarusho kadasanzwe ku magara yacu. Umwe mu bashakashatsi, Prof. John Cummings, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubu ibimenyetso ni vyinshi kandi bikomeye: ni ngombwa ko abantu batangura kugira ico bakoze kuri iki kintu ". Ubwoko bw'izi mfungurwa burazwi cane mu kurwanya kugumirwa, ariko uturusho zizanira amagara ni twinshi cane. Abashakashatsi bo kw'ishure kaminuza ya Otago muri Nouvelle-Zélande, hamwe n'abo kw'ishure kaminuza ya Dundee, bemeza ko abantu bategerezwa gufungura n'imiburiburi 25g (garama)  za fibre ku musi. Ariko bavuga ko uru ari urugero "rubayabaye" mu kubungabunga amagara, ariko ko kurenza 30 navyo ari ngirakamaro cane. Umuhwi wonyene ukwawo upima hafi 120g, ariko rero si ukuvuga ko ufise fibres gusa. Ukuyemwo ibiwugize vyose, nk'isukari hamwe n'amazi, usigarana 3g zonyene za fibres. Abantu benshi kw'isi bafungura fibre ziri musi ya 20g ku musi. Mu Bwongereza, abantu bari musi y'umwe ku bantu cumi bakuze nibo bafungura 30g ku musi. Ugereranije, usanga abagore bafungura hafi 17g, abagabo nabo 21g ku musi. Uzozisanga mu vyamwa n'imboga, intete zimwe zimwe zikunze kwiherezwa mu gitondo, imikate n'ubutsima bikozwe mu ntete zidakoboye, intete zumye ziva  ku biharage n'ibindi bimeze nka vyo, indengu (lentilles), ubushaza, ivyema/ibiyoba  n'intete. Elaine Rush, umwigisha w'ibijanye n'imfungurwa kuri kaminuza y'ubuhinga ya Auckland, afatira kuri aka karorero mu gusigura iziri hagati ya 25g na 30g: igice c'igikombe ca avoine (oats)- 9g za fibres | agapande k'umukate usa n'ubutsima bw'ingano (pain gris) - 2 g za fibres | igikombe k'indengu zitetse  - 4 g za fibres | ikirayi gitekanye ibishishwa  - 2g za fibres | inusu y'igikombe ca betterave  - 1g za fibres | ikaroti imwe  - 3g za fibres | paume imwe iriko ibishishwa  - 4g za fibres Ariko yongerako ati: "Ntivyoroshe kwongereza urugero rwa fibre mu mfungurwa". Prof Cummings aravyemera. Ati: "Ni ikibazo gikomeye". Ikigo kijewe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza National Health Service, kirabisigura. Muri izi nzira harimwo : Ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru ajanye n'amagara y'abantu Lancet cashize ahabona ivyavuye mu vyigwa 185 vyakozwe hamwe n'bindi 58 vyakorewe ku mavuriro. Nk'uko ivyavuye muri ibi vyigwa bivyerekana, ufashe abantu 1000 ukabavana ku mfungurwa bahora bafungura zifise fibres nkeya ( munsi ya 15g)  ukabashira ku mfungurwa zifise fibres zikwiye (25-29g), ushobora gusanga ukijije abantu 13 bari gupfa, hamwe n'abandi batandatu bari gufatwa n'indwara z'umutima. Ibi ni ivyavuye mu vyigwa bisanzwe bikurikirana abantu mu kiringo c'imyaka kuva kw'icumi gushika kuri 20. Iki cigwa cerekana kandi ko abasanzwe bafungura fibres badakunda kurwara indwara z'igisukari co ku rugero rwa kabiri hamwe na kanseri yo mu mara, zikongera zikagabanya ibiro vy'umurengera, umuvuduko w'amaraso hamwe na vya binure cholesterol. Uko abantu bafungura indya zirimwo fibres, niko amagra yabo atera amera neza. Muri kahise, abantu bibaza ko ama fibres ata kintu kinini akora mu mubiri, ko umubiri udashobora kuzihingura, ko umuntu yazifungura akazisohora uko nyene. Ariko, fibres zituma twumva ko duhaze kandi zikagira uruhara mu guhingura imfungurwa zirimwo ibinure mu rura ruto. Ibintu bikomera cane mu gihe ziri mu rura runini, kubera bacteries  ziri mu rura runini ari zo ica yihereza. Urura runini rutunze amamiriyaridi y'a bacteries, iyo rero ufunguye fibres nyinshi nizo zica ziba imfungurwa zazo. Si ibintu bitangaje ko umubiri wacu ukeneye ama fibres, intete zidakoboye, ivyamwa n'imboga ku magara yacu. Ariko bivanye n'uko abantu benshi usanga badakunze kwihereza imfungurwa nkenerwa, hari ubwoba ko usanga badafata fibres zikwiye. Prof Nita Forouhi wo kw'ishure kaminuza ya Cambridge avuga ati: "Ni ngombwa ko dufata nka nkama ivyavuye muri kino cigwa". "Ivyavuyemwo bisigura ko, n'aho abantu benshi usanga badakunze kwihereza imfungurwa ndemamubiri, ni ngombwa ko biyumvira uruhombo bagira iyo badafunguye fibres zikomoka mu ntete zidakoboye". "Ubu bushakashatsi buremeza ko fibres hamwe n'intete zidakoboye zifise akamaro kadasanzwe ku magara yacu mu gihe kirekire". Iki cigwa cakozwe mu ntumbero yo gufasha ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO gutegura ivyemezo ku bijanye n'urugero rwa fibres abantu bakwiye gufata kugira ngo babungabunge amagara yabo. Bumwe mu buryo bwo kwongereza urugero rwa fibres mu mfungurwa zacu ni uguheba imikate ikozwe mw'ifu y'intete zikoboye tukaja ku yikozwe mu ntete zidakoboye. Ni vyo vyabaye ku masoko y'izi mfungurwa, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'urukurikirane rw'ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na reta ku bijanye n'ingene imiryango yagiye ikoresha amafaranga kuva mu 1974. Kuva hagati y'imyaka ya 1970 gushika hagati y'imyaka ya 1980, umukate wera wagiye ugabanuka, mu gihe umukate usa n'umutsima w'ingano (pain gris)  hamwe n'uwukozwe mw'ifu y'intete zidakoboye wagiye wiyongera. Kuva ico gihe, umukate wera wagiye ugabanuka kw'isoko, mu gihe imikate isa n'umutsima w'ingano n'iyikozwe mw'ifu y'intete zidakoboye yagiye yiyongera cane muri ico gihe, n'aho vyagiye bukebuke. Bigaragara rero ko, mu gihe ibitigiri vy'abarondera umukate kw'isi vyagabanutse, myinshi mu yagurishijwe yari imikate ifise urugero runini rwa fibres.

column2: Prince Philip yari samurarwa wa Edinburgh, umugabo w’umwamikazi Elizabeth II w’Ubwongereza, yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo
column3: Prince Philip, samurarwa w’I Edinburgh akaba n’umugabo w’umwamikazi Elizabeth II w’Ubwongereza, yasandavye afise imyaka 99. Umuganwa n’umwamikazi bari bamaze imyaka 70 bubatse. Baraganye k’uwa 20 z’ukwa cumi na rimwe 1947, i Westminster Abbey, mu gisagara ca London. Kurikirana vyinshi muri iyi video ku buzima bw'uyu muhisi...

column2: Tanzania: Basaba ko Diamond Platnumz akurwa mw'ihiganwa rya BET kubera avugira Magufuli
column3: Abantu barenga 18.000 muri Tanzania bateye igikumu ku rwandiko (petition) rusaba ko wa muririmvyi rurangiranwa Diamond Platnumz akurwa ku rutonde rw'ihiganwa rya Amerika, bamwagiriza ko "yakingira ikibaba" uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu. Diamond, umwe mu baririmvyi rurangiranwa muri Afrika, ari ku rutonde rw'abahiganirwa agashimwe gahabwa abanyatugenegene bakomeye kw'isi kiswe Best International Act, gatangwa n'imboneshakure BET (Black Entertainment Television). Ariko abateguye uru rwandiko bagereranya uyu muririmvyi mu buryo butabereye n'abaherutse gutahukana ihiganwa rya BET bo muri Nigeria Davido na Burna Boy, abaririmvyi bazwi cane muri ico gihugu. Ku bw'aba bateguye uru rwandiko, aba baririmvyi babiri "bakoresha inguvu zabo bafise n'ubuhangange bwabo mu gutera amashurwe akarenganyo" muri ca gihe c'imyiyerekano yitiriwe #EndSARS mu mwaka uheze yari ifise intumbero yo gusaba ko reta ifuta ca gipolisi citswe SARS. Ikinyamakuru NairobiNews co muri Kenya, candika ko Diamond Platnumz yari ashigikiye cane uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania, John Pombe Magufuli, kandi ko umwe mu miziki yiwe wakoreshejwe n'umugambwe CCM uri ku butegetsi mu gihe c'imyiyamamazo y'umwaka uheze. Gisubiramwo ivyanditse muri uru rwandiko, iki kinyamakuru candika kiti: "Diamond Platnumz ni umuririmvyi rurangiranwa wa Tanzania azwi cane kw'isi yakoresheje ukumenyekana kwiwe n'ubuhinga bwiwe mu kuvugira no gukingira ikibaba itoteza ribi cane ry'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu yatwaza umukazo John Magufuli n'ubutegetsi bwiwe". "Diamond kandi ni incuti pfa mpfe kandi akorana urudandaza na Paul Makonda yahoze ari umukuru w'igisagara ca Dar-es-Salaam yatoteje ku mugaragaro kandi akanahiga buhongo abahuza ibitsina babisangiye (LGBTI)". Magufuli, yasandavye mu kwa gatatu haciye imisi mike ashikirijwe amabanga yo kurongora Tanzania mu kiringo kigira kabiri, yaragirijwe ko yahonyanga uburenganzira bwo gushikiriza ivyiyumviro no gutoteza abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bwiwe. Iki kinyamakuru  gikorera ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi candika ko n'abo bimeze uko, hari n'imiburiburi umushingamateka umwe - Nusrat Hanje - yamuguye inyuma aramuvugira, ati "turamusengera kugira ngo atahukane aka gashimwe".

column2: Tanzania: Perezida Magufuli yirukanye umukozi wa leta yatabuye Ikorowani
column3: Perezida John  Magufuli wa Tanzania amenyesha ko yirukanye burundu mu kazi umukozi wa leta yatabuye igitabo ceranda c'Ikorowani, maze akwiragiza isanamu ku mbuga hwaniro ariko arayitabura. Yatangaje iyo ngingo uno munsi mu gihe yari mu birori vyo kwugurura ibiro vy'akarere ka Kigamboni mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam. Ati: "Nyakwubahwa Jafo, hirya y'ejo niho numva, ko hari umuntu hariya i Kilosa yatabuye igitabo ceranda". "Ndagushimiye cane kubona warafashe ingingo yo kuba uramuhagarika, ariko jeho ndamwirukanye burundu. Mwandikire ikete ko yirukanywe burundu". "Atsinda urubanza canke atsindwa, uyo ntakiri umukozi wa leta, ntidushobora kubandanya dukorana n'abakozi b'ibijuju nk'abo muri ino leta". Mu ndwi iheze, umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutegetsi bw'intara n'amakomine, Selemani Jafo, yategetse ko umukozi w'ibiro vy'akarere ka Kilosa mu ntara ya Morogoro, Daniel Elimringi, ahagarikwa, ku caha co gutabura igitabu c'idini rya Isilamu, Ikorowani. Jafo ati: "Ni ukuri, iki kintu cakozwe n'umukozi nk'uyu nta ciza kizanira igihugu cacu kubera abanyagihugu bacu mu madini yose basanzwe babanye mu mahoro kandi bubahana mu butandukane". Iyo ngingo ya Jafo yafashwe inyuma y'aho isanamu yerekana uyo mukozi wa leta mu gisata c'ubudandaji mu biro vy'akarere ka Kilosa ariko aratabagura ico gitabo, ikwiragijwe ku mbuga hwaniro zitandukanye. Ikinyamakuru Mtanzania co muri ico gihugu kimenyesha ko uyo mukozi yamaze kurengutswa muri sentare, kandi ko yankiwe kuburana yidegemvya. Ico kinyamakuru gitangaza ko urwo rubanza ruzosubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 20 z'uku kwa kabiri.

column2: Ubuhindi bwategetse Google kuriha irindi hadabu ry’imiliyoni $113
column3: Ikigo c’Ubuhindi kijejwe kugenzura ihiganwa ku masoko caciye Google ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 113 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika kubera ibikorwa biteye kubiri n’amategeko ajanye n’ihiganwa mu gisata c’itumatumanako, igihano kigira kabiri mu kiringo kiri munsi y’indwi imwe. Ico kigo cagiriza Google gukoresha ubwiganze ifise mu bubiko bwayo bw’ama Apps (applications)  mu guhatira abahingura ama Apps kuriha bakoresheje app yayo. Iki kigo gisaba iyi kompanyi rutura y’ubuhinga kutazibira abahingura ama Apps kuriha bakoresheje ubundi buryo canke baciye mu zindi nzira. Google yavuzeko iriko irihweza ivyo birego. Umuvugizi wa Google avuga ati: “Mu kugumiza ku giciro gito,  vyatumye ubuhinga bwa digital (numérique) bukomera mbere bwugururira imiryango amamiriyoni amajana n’amajana y’Abahindi”. Uyo muvugizi yagize ati: “Tubandanya kwitaho abakoresha n’abahingura ama Apps, tukaba turiko turihweza iyi ngingo kugira ngo turabe intambwe zikurikira”. Muri iki cemezo canditse ku mpapuro 199 casohowe ku wa kabiri, ikigo c’Ubuhindi kijejwe kugenzura ihiganwa ku masoko, (Competition Commission of India, CCI) kivuga ko Google iriko ikoresha amategeko amwe amwe mu bubiko bwayo bwa Play Store ategeka abahingura ama Apps “gukoresha gusa” ubuhinga bwayo mu gutanga canke kugurisha ama Apps. Ikinyamakuru Reuters kivugako ico kigo kijejwe ubugenzuzi gisaba Google gufata ingingo umunani zikosora ibi bintu mu mezi atatu, harimwo kutazibira abahingura ama Apps gukoresha ubundi buryo bwo kuriha, haba mu kugura ikibanza muri Apps zisanzwe zirimwo canke kugura ama Apps. CCI  ivuga kandi iti: “Google itegerezwa gukorera mu muco iyo ivugana n’abahingura ama Apps kandi igatanga insiguro ku mafaranga basabwa”. Iyi ni ingingo y’incamugongo ya vuba kuri Google isanzwe ihanzwe n’ibirego bituma itakaza icizere mu Buhindi. Mu ndwi iheze iyi kompanyi yatangishijwe ihadabu ry’imiliyoni 161 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika kubera yakoresheje urubuga rwa Android kugira yiganzire isoko. CCI  ivuga ko Google iriko ikoresha amasezerano y’agahato ku bakoresha ububiko bwayo kugira ngo imbuga zayo – nka Google Chrome, YouTube, Google Maps  n’izindi – zikoreshwe. Itohoza rijanye na Android ryaratangujwe mu 2019, inyuma y’imyidogo y’abakoresha Telefone zo mu buhinga bwa Android.

column2: Ethiopia -Tigray: ONU igabisha ko igihugu gihakwa kuja mu ntambara cose
column3: Ishirahamwe mpuzakungu ONU rigasbisha ko Ethiopia ishobora kuja mu ntambara y'igihugu cose hamwe indwano yo mu ntara y'uburaruko ya Tigray itohogarara vuba. Umukuru w'igisata kijejwe ibibazo vya poritike n'ugukomeza amahoro muri ONU  Rosemary DiCarlo avuga ko ata mfashanyo irashika ku murwa mukuru wa Tigray, Mekelle, kuva hagati mu kwezi kw'icumi mu gihe hari abantu bashika miriyoni indwi bayikeneye vyihuta. ONU ivuga ko abantu bashika 400.000 babayeho nko mu bihe vy'amapfa. Kuri uyu wa kabiri, intumwa y'ishirahamwe rya Afrika AU mu bihugu vy'ihembe rya Afrika, Olusegun Obasanjo, yavuze ko yabonanye n'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa  Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed, n'indongozi y'intara ya Tigray, Debretsion Gebremichael. Avuga ko bompi bemera ko iyo ntambara ari iya poritike ariko ko hatigeze havugwa ibiganiro vy'imbona nkubone hagati yabo. ONU ishaka ko ingabo za reta n'abayigwanya  bahagarika intambara bakava muri ako karere kugira  bishoboke ko hashikayo imfashanyo n'imiti bikenewe cane. Hagati aho Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (US) n'Ishirahamwe rya Afrika bavuga ko babona ko hari amahirwe make yo gutorera inyishu ikibazo ca Ethiopia . Intumwa idasanzwe ya US Jeffrey Feltman aherutse i Addis Abeba aho yabonanye n'abo muri AU hamwe n'abategetsi ba reta. Intumwa ya AU Olusegun Obasanjo yabwiye inama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano ko umwanya uriko urahera kandi ko hazoba akaga gakomeye cane ku bantu hamwe intambara itotorerwa inyishu vuba. Iyo ntambnara yo muri Ethiopia imaze umwaka yadutse hagati y'ingabo za reta mpuza-ntara n'abagwanyi b'umugambwe wahora utwara intara  ya Tigray, TPLF. Abo bagwanyi bavuga ko bagiye gusugereza  umugwa mukuru Addis Ababa mu gihe reta nayo yahamagariye abahora mu ngabo bakukurutse gusubira gufata umuheto bakitaba urugamba. Umuvugizi w'abagwanyi ba Tigray avuga ko bazokomeza gushika reta ivanyeho ingingo zo kwugarana iyo ntara. Getachew Reda yabwiye ikiganiro BBC Focus on Africa ko intambanyi yonyene iri mu nzira y'amahoro muri Ethiopia ari ministre wa mbere Abih Ahmed mu "kwibohera ku nyishu iciye mu nzira ya gisirikare  ku kibazo ahanini ca poritike". Getachew  avuga ati: "Ico dukeneye cane si Addis Ababa, ico dushaka n'uko tugondoza [Abiy] akavanaho ukwugarana intara yacu". "Abiy niwe ategerezwa kwemera ivyo dusaba… hanyuma akarangiza intambara." Uwo muvugizi avuga ko uwahoze ari umukuru wa Nigeria, Olusegun Obasanjo, ari muri Ethiopia kugerageza kuvugana n'impande zose ingene intabara yorangira, yagiranye ibiganiro vyiza n'umukuru wa TPLF, Debretsion Gebremichael.

column2: Obiang: P﻿rezida amaze imyaka 43 ku butegetsi agira asubire kwitoza muri Guinee Equatoriale
column3: U﻿mukuru w'igihugu wa mbere arambiye ku butegetsi kw'isi ariko ararondera gusubira kw'itoza inyuma y'imyaka 43 amaze ku butegetsi muri Guinee Equatoriale. P﻿rezida Teodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo w'imyaka 80 afise intwaro ivugwamwo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu, cane cane kuboreza igufa abantu no kubanyuruza. B﻿amwe mu batavuga rumwe na reta bari muri aayo matora ariko ntibiteze kuyatsinda. U﻿wo muprezida yagize icibare ciwe ico gihugu kirangwamwo ubutunzi bw'igitoro, aho abo mu muryango wiwe bari mu bibanza bikomakomeye. U﻿muhungu wiwe, ari mu kibanza c'icegera ca prezida, Teodoro "Teodorin" Nguema Obiang Mangue, yaragize ubuzima buzimvye cane muri Amerika n'i Buraya, akaba mbere anafise ibirato vy'intoke bizimvye cane biriko amabuye y'agaciro vyahoze ari ivyo umuririmvyi rurangiranwa Michael Jackson, nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi b'Ubwongereza. Prof Ana Lúcia Sá yabwiye BBC ati:"Ayo matora nta co aje guhindura." Prof  Sá umuhinga mu vya politike n'intwaro z'agahahazo zo muri Afrika kuri kaminuza ya Lisbon yagize ati:"﻿Ntakizohinduka". Y﻿ongeyeko ko "azi nezako Obiang azotorwa n'amajwi arenga 95%". I﻿bi kandi babihurirako n'uwuharanira agateka ka zina muntu Tutu Alicante, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amaakuru rya Reuters:"Ku musi wa Mungu abantu bazotora uko reta ibibitezeko, kubera ntushobora kuvuga wisanzuye ico wiyumvira muri Guinee Equatoriale." A﻿licante abandanya avuga ati:"Abatavuga rumwe na reta nta maahirwe bafise. Araza kugira ibishoboka vyose kugira ntave ku butegetsi." I﻿migambwe itavuga rumwe na reta barapfa kuyireka igakora ariko ikagira ikibazo c'uko ata tangazamakuru ryigenga rihari, kuko ibinyamakuru vyose, bitari mu minwe ya reta, biba ari ivyo abayishigikiye. V﻿yibazwa ko prezida Obiang yaheruka guhakana ivyo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu n'ubusuma mu matora, ariko aragerageza kugira isura nziza mu makungu. M﻿u kwezi kw'icenda, reta yarakuyeho igihano co gupfa, ingingo yashimwe na Onu.

column2: Papa Francis yashoboye gusoma imisa ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro inyuma yo kubagwa urura
column3: Papa Francis yashoboye kwiyereka abantu ubwa mbere kuva bamukoze kubera ingorane y'urura runini, haraciye indwi. Mu gihe yaboneka ko ameze neza, uyu mupapa w'imyaka 84 yasomye imisa yo muri ino ndwi ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro  Gemelli i Roma. Abantu baharurwa mu majana bakoraniye hanze y'ibi bitaro, bamwe bakoma akaruru ngo "Viva il Papa!" (Twogereranya na "Papa, ramba"). Vaticano ivuga ko igikorwa co kuvura Papa indwara y'urura runini izwi nka "symptomatic diverticular stenosis" cagenze neza. Papa yabwiye abari aho ati: "Ndanezerewe kubona nshoboye kurangura ibanga ryanje ryo ku wa Mungu n'aho ndi ng'aha". "Narumvise ko mwambaye hafi cane kandi ko mwansengeye. Ndabashimiye n'umutima wanje wose". Ashimira abakozi bo muri ivyo bitaro, yavuze ko "yiboneye ingene ubuvuzi bwiza ari nkenerwa, kandi bose bakaburonka, mu bindi bihugu nk'uko bimeze hano mu Butariyano". Yongerako ati: "Ntidutakaze aya mahirwe. Ni ngombwa ko tuyabungabunga". Bamwe mu bana barwariye muri ivyo bitaro babonetse bari kumwe na Papa ku rubaraza. Ntibiramenyekana ikiringo azomara muri ibi bitaro mu gihe azoba ariko ararwaruka. Indwara ya Diverticular ni indwara itera ibivyimba mu rura runini, bigashobora gutuma rwipfungānya, bigatuma umuntu yuzura inda akanababara mu nda. Francis, yavutse mu  1936 i Buenos Aires, yaratakaje igice c'ihaha ry'iburyo afise imyaka 21. Afise kandi ikibazo co mu matako kimutera ububabare buhera mu gice co hasi c'umugongo bukamanuka mu maguru. Mu 2014, yagiye ahagarika ibikorwa bimwe bimwe kubera ibibazo vyo mu mushishito.

column2: Burundi: Vyinshi kuri kahise ka Pierre Buyoya yashengeye ku myaka 71
column3: Majoro Petero Buyoya yashengeye ku myaka 71, yari mu basirikare bakuru b'icahoze ari igisirikare c'Uburundi kizwi nka FAB (Forces Armées Burundaises). Yashitse ubwa mbere ku butegetsi mu 1987, atembagaje ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Jean-Baptiste Bagaza na we nyene yari yashitse ku butegetsi abanje gutembagaza ubutegetsi bwa Michel Micombero mu 1976. Mu myaka itandatu ubutegetsi bwiwe bwamaze, bwibukirwa ku bintu bitari bike vyahinduye isura y'igihugu, nk'ubwicanyi bwa Ntega-Marangara mu 1988, amasezerano y'ubumwe bw'abarundi yemejwe mu 1991, umuzo w'intwaro ishingiye ku migambwe myinshi mu 1993, n'ibindi. Yagiye kuva ku butegetsi mu 1993 atsinzwe mu matora ya mbere ashingiye ku migambwe myinshi kuva mu myaka ya 1960. Ico gihe, Prezida Melchior Ndadaye wo mu mugambwe Frodebu ni we yatahukanye intsinzi y'amajwi arenga 65% na yo Pierre Buyoya yari yitoje kw'izina ry'umugambwe Uprona aronka amajwi yababa 33%. Buyoya yasubiye kugaruka ku butegetsi mu kwezi kw'indwi 1996, asubiriye kandi gutembagaza ubutegetsi bwa Prezida mfatakibanza Sylvestre Ntibantunganya, uyu na we akaba yari yasubiriye Cyprien Ntaryamira yaheruka guhitanwa n'isanganya ry'indege i Kigali mu Rwanda ari kumwe na mugenzi we Gen Juvénal Habyarimana. Prezida Ntaryamira yari amaze amezi abiri ashikirijwe ayo mabanga, inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Prezida Ndadaye. Igandagurwa rya Prezida Ndadaye ryatumye igihugu cinjira mu ntambara yari ifise isura y'ubwoko, hagati y'abahutu n'abatutsi. Vyabaye ngombwa ko Perezida Buyoya aganira n'abariko bararwanya reta, mu biganiro vyamaze imyaka ibiri kuva mu 1998 gushika bashike ku masezerano y'amahoro yateweko igikumu mu kwezi kw'umunani 2000. Kuva ico gihe, Prezida Buyoya yaciye yemezwa kurongora igice ca mbere c'intwaro mfatakibanza categekanywa n'amasezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha, maze aza kuva ku butegetsi mu 2003 abishije Prezida Domitien Ndayizeye. Amaze kuva ku butegetsi inyuma y'amasezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha, Buyoya yari afise ikibanza mu nama nkenguzamateka ubuzima bwiwe bwose nk'uko vyategekanywa n'amasezerano ya Arusha. Mu mwaka wa 2008, yagenwe kurongora umurwi w'intumwa za ONU zari zirungitswe muri Tchad mu ntumbero yo gutorera umuti icuka kibi cari hagati y'ico gihugu n'igihugu kibanyi ca Sudani. Mu kwa mbere 2013, niho Prezida Buyoya yasubira akagenwa n'umuryango w'Ubumwe bwa Afrika kuwuserukira nk'intumwa idasanzwe muri Mali no mu karere ka Sahel. Mu 2014, yashatse kwitoza ngo arongore ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu bivuga ururimi rw'igifaransa, kandi ico gihe reta y'Uburundi yaramushigikiye kuko imigenderanire yari ikiri myiza. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka kuva mu 2015, igihe haduka mu Burundi indyane za politike zishingiye ku ngingo y'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu, nyakwigendera Perezida Petero Nkurunziza, yo kwitoreza ikiringo kigira gatatu c'umukuru w'igihugu. Ico gihe, abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bavuga ko giteye kubiri n'amategeko, ariko Perezida Nkurunziza n'umugambwe wiwe CNDD-FDD, bobo bavuga ko ico kiringo cubahirije ibwirizwa shingiro. Kuri ico kiringo Buyoya yari yavuze ko amasezerano ya Arusha atomoye, ko ibiringo ari bibiri gusa. Kuva ico gihe, imigenderanire hagati yiwe n'ubutegetsi yaciye itosekara, akaba atasubiriye guhonyoza ikirenge mu Burundi. Mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2018, Buyoya yashizwe ku rutonde rw'abantu 17 baronderwa n'ubutungane bw'Uburundi bagirizwa kugira uruhara mw'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye. Buyoya ntavyo yari yiteze kuko yabona ko amasezerano ya Arusha amukingira, aho yamenyesha ko ikibazo c'iyicwa rya Ndadaye gitegerezwa gutorerwa inyishu biciye mu murwi wo kumenya ukuri no kurekuriranira.  Wewe rero yabona ko rwari urubanza rushingiye kuri politike. Mbere yaranagabishije ko rushobora gutuma hasubira kwaduka amacakubiri y'amoko mu gihugu. Ivyo ntivyabujije ubutungane bw'Uburundi kumucira umunyorororo wo guherayo, mu kwezi kw'icumi, we n'abo bagirizwa hamwe urupfu rwa Prezida Melchior Ndadaye. Buyoya n'abo bari kumwe bavuga ko bunguruje urubanza.

column2: Coronavirus: OMS iti ‘Afrika ntizoba urubuga rwo kugerageza urucanco urwo ari rwo rwose".
column3: Umukuru w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi,OMS/WHO ariyamiriza amajambo "y'ivanguramoko" yashikirijwe n'abaganga babiri b'Abafaransa aho bavuze ko urucanco rwa covid-19 rwogeragerezwa muri Afrika. Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus arongoye OMS ati: "Afrika ntishobora kuba kandi ntizigera iba urubuga rwo kugeragerezako urucanco urwo ari rwo rwose". Ayo majambo yashikirijwe mu kiganiro caciye kuri televiziyo yarateye icuka kibi, abo baganga bakaba baragirijwe ko bafata Abanyafrika "nk'imbeba z'inzungu". Vyabaye ngomwa ko umwe muri bo asaba imbabazi. Abajijwe ku bijanye n'ivyashikirijwe n'abo baganga mu kiganiro OMS yariko igirana n'abanyamakuru, Dr. Terdros yabonetse ko arakaye, aho yavuze ko ivyo vyerekana  "ivyiyumviro vy'ubukoloni". Ati: "Ni ibintu biteye isoni kandi bibabaje kwumva mu kinjana ca 21 hakiri abahinga bashobora gushikiriza amajambo nk'ayo. Turavyiyamirije twivuye inyuma, kandi turabijeje ko ivyo bitazigera bisubira". Mu kiganiro caciye kuri televiziyo y'abafaransa LCI, ku wa 01 z'uku kwa kane, Dr Camille Locht  ajejwe ubushakashatsi mu kigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu n'ubushakashatsi (Inserm), yariko avuga ibijanye n'igerageza ry'urucanco i Bulaya na Australia. Niho rero Dr Jean-Paul Mira, ajejwe kuvura indembe ku bitaro vya Coshin i Paris yinamura akavuga ati: "Ngerageje kuvuga mu majambo yo nyayo, kubera iki tutogeragereza urwo rucanco muri Afrika, ahantu ata dutambara two kwikingira bafise, ata miti bafise, ata n'uburyo bafise bwo gutabara indembe?" "Erega ni nk'uko bisanzwe bigenda ahandi mu bushakashatsi bumwe bumwe kuri SIDA. Nko mu ba maraya, turahakorera igerageza kuko tuzi ko ari bo babangamiwe kandi kubera tuzi ko batikingira". Niho muganga Locht, yaca ashigikira mugenziwe, muganga Mira, avuga ati: "Uvuze ukuri, turategekanya ubushakashatsi nk'ubwo bwokorwa no muri Afrika". Imbere y'aho, muganga Mira yari yerekanye amakenga kuri iryo gerageza ririko riraba, avuga ko atizeye ko bashobora gushika ku vyo bipfuza muri Australia n'i Bulaya kubera bobo bafise ibikoresho vyo kwikingira iyo bari ku kazi. Ayo majambo yatumye Abanyafrika mu bice vyose vy'uwo mugabane bashangashirwa, harimwo n'uwahoze ari umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru, Didier Drogba, yavuze ko ayo majambo ari ayo ivanguramoko rishingiye ku rukoba. Yavuze kandi ati: "Kirazira ko abanya Afrika bafatwa nk'imbeba! Ako ni akagaye". Mugenziwe Samuel Eto'o nawe nyene yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa umupira w'amaguru, wewe yavuze ko abo baganga ari "abicanyi". Amajambo y'abo baganga kandi yongereje ubwoba bwari busanzwe buhari muri Afrika ko Abanyafrika bashobora gufatwa nk'imbeba z'inzungu bakageragerezwako urucanco rushasha rwa coronavirus.

column2: Ubufaransa bwemeje amakori ataguye neza Amerika
column3: Inama nshingamateka y'Ubufaransa yemeje integuro y'itegeko rigena amakori acibwa ibigo bikomakomeye nka Google, Facebook na Apple. Guca 3% nk'ikori ku bikorwa vy'ibigo bikoresha itumatumanako bigera ku 30 birwiriyemwo ivyo muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bishobora kuzanira leta y'Ubufaransa miliyoni 400 z'ama euros muri uyu mwaka wonyene. Abashingamateka birengagije akamo ka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zavuga ko ari akarenganyo, kandi ko zigiye kwihora mu kuzoshiraho amakori nk'ayo. Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca Leta w'Ubufaransa Bruno Le Maire yiyamirije impungenge za Amerika, avuga ko ibintu nk'ibi bikwiye gutoregwa umuti mu biganiro. Ubufaransa buvuga ko bikwiye ko ibigo vyifashisha itumatumanako, bitanga amakori aho bikorera aho kuyatanga aho bifise icicaro gikuru, ivyinshi bikaba bibarizwa muri Amerika. Ubufaransa bwananiwe kwumvisha ibindi bihugu gufatira hamwe iyo ngingo mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya, bari kwita 'GAFAs' mu majambo avunaguye, n'ukuvuga Google, Apple, Facebook na Amazon. Ubu rero bwahisemwo gutangura bwo nyene guca ayo makori, ariko bukizera ko iyi ngingo yabwo izoba iy'igihe gito. Hari ibiganiro hagati y'ibihugu bitunze kuruta ibindi bigize umugwi G7 hamwe n'ikigo kijejwe kuraba  imigenderanire mu butunzi n'iterambere mu kugabangana amakori avanwa mw'ikoreshwa ry'itumatumanako muri kino gihe rifise ikibanza gikomeye. Gutyo rero hakaboneka umwumvikano uvuye mu nama ugasubirira ingingo nka bene iyi y'Ubufaransa. Ubwongereza bwatangaje umugambi wo gushiraho amakori asa n'aya y'Ubufaransa, ico cemezo kikazoshobora kuja mu bikorwa mu mwaka uza. Espagne yo yakoze umushinge w'itegeko muri uyu mwaka. Umunyamakuru Dave Lee akorera muri Amerika ya ruguru ati 'Ubufaransa burikumiriye'. Ubutegetsi bwa Washington bwamaze kuvuga ko bugiye kwugurura ingingo yitwa 'Section 301', mu nzira yo gutohoza nimba hari aho burenganywa. Ni ingingo yakoreshejwe mbere, nk'inzira yo gushiraho ibiciro bishasha ku bihugu ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwibaza ko biriko biburiramwo mbege. Nimba Ubufaransa bugiye gukura miliyoni amajana z'ama euros mu mifuko y'ibi bihangange vyo muri Amerika, Amerika nayo ishobora kuvuga iti :'kuki tweho tutokura amafranga mu vyo Ubufaransa bukorera iwacu?' Uko niko vyagenze ku Bushinwa,  bigahamba Amerika mu ntambara y'ubudandaji ishobora no gukomera muri kazoza. Amakori ku bikorwa vy'itumatumanako, ni ikibazo giteye impungenge ku Bufaransa, kuko bwikumiriye. Ibiganiro vyigeze gutangura hagati y'ibihugu kuri ayo makori vyahavuye biburizwamwo kuko bamwe muri bo batari bashigikiye ayo makori. Aha umuntu yovuga nka Irland yavyungukiyemwo mu guhamagara abashoramitahe bashaka isoko ku mugabane wa Bulaya. Ibindi bihugu nk'Ubwongereza, Espagne na Autriche biracagonanwa gufata iyo nzira. Ico impande zompi zihuriyeko n'uko igihe carenze co kwiyumvira ingene ibigo vyungukira mw'itumatumanako bitozwa amakori. Ubufaransa bushobora kwitega ibintu bibiri. N'uko ibihugu bitera ikirenge mu cabwo bishiraho amategeko yavyo, bigatuma Ubufaransa butaba nyamwigendako. Ikindi n'uko iyo ntambwe Ubufaransa bwateye ishobora gutuma n'ibindi bihugu bibona ko hageze kwumvikana uko bitoza ayo makori biri hamwe. Ivyo vyotuma amafranga ivyo bigo vyahora vyikwegerako ataha mu bigega vy'ibihugu.

column2: Omicron: US igiye kuvanaho kubuza ingendo ziva muri Africa y'ubumanuko
column3: Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zigiye kuvanaho ingingo zo kubuza ingendo z'indege ziva mu bihugu munani vyo muri Afrika y'ubumanuko kubera ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa coronavirus. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu White House vyavuze ko izo ngingo  zari yafatiwe ibihugu vya Afrika y'Epfo , Botswana, Zimbabwe, Mozambique, Namibia, Lesotho, Eswatini na Malawi ku wa 29 Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11) zizovanwaho buca ari umunsi wa Bonane. Ivyo biro bivuga ko izo ngingo zitagikenewe mu gihe ibitigiri vy'abandura Omicron vyaduze cane muri Amerika. Ubu ubwo bwoko nibwo bwiganje mu bashasha batorwa ko banduye  uwo mugera. "Izo ngingo zaduhaye umwanya wo gutahura Omicron ubu tukaba tuzi ko incanco zihasanzwe zikora kuri Omicron, cane cane iyo umuntu yaronse urwo gushimangira" , vyanditswe kuri Twitter n'icegera c'umunyamabanga ajejwe ivyo kumenyesha amakuru muri White House Kevin Munoz. Izo ngingo zari zafashwe ubwa mbere n'Ishirahamwe rya Buraya n'Ubwongereza. Amerika n'ibindi bihugu bitari bike vyaciye bikurikira. Izo ngingo zaraneguwe cane, umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU Antonio Guterres akaba yazise ko ari "apartheid mu ngendo". Izo ngingo ntizabuza Abanyamerika gusubira mu gihugu iwabo bava muri ico gice ca Afrika, zakora ku bantu batari abanyamerika gusa. Mu gusigura igituma iyo ngingo yafashwe, umujenama mukuru ku bijanye na coronavírus muri biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu White House (Maison Blanche), Dr   Dr Anthony Fauci,  yavuze mu minsi iheze ko vyari "vyakozwe mu gihe ata na kimwe twari bwamenye" kuri Omicron. Yavuze ati: "Twese turababazwa cane n'amagume ashobora kuba yashizwe kuri Afrika y'Epfo, no ku bindi bihugu vyo muri Afrika." Ku ndwi iheze , Canada nayo yakuyeho ingingo zayo yari yafatiye ingenzi z'abanyamahanga ziva mu bihgu 10 vyo muri Afrika. Umutegetsi yavuze ko ukwiyongera kw'abandura uwo mugera mu gihugu gutuma izo ngingo "zitagikenewe". Ibinyamakuru vyo muri Canada imbere y'aho vyari vyavuze ko hari abanya-Canada bategerezwa guca baca muri Ethiopia mu gutaha n'ubwo hari  inama n'ubu ikiri mu ngiro  yo kutagendera ico gihugu co mw'ihembe rya Afrika. Abaganga muri Afrika y'Epfo -aho Omicron yavuzwe ubwa mbere-  bavuze ubu vuba ko kwandura ubwo bwoko bushasha  bitera gusa kurwara bibayabaye. Ivyo vyigwa kuva ico gihe vyarashigikiwe n'ivyigwa vyakzwe mu Bwongereza. Ubwo bwoko bwararandagase kuruta ubundi bwose muri Amerika ariko gushika ubu  nta bitigiri buratuma kwongerekana ku baja mu bitaro. Gushika ubu umuntu umwe wenyene niwe amaze gupfa kw'isano n'ubwoko bwa Omicron: umugabo wo muri Texas afise mu myaka 50 atari yararonse urucanco kandi yari asanzwe agendana izindi ngorane z'amagara.
